original: nyid kyi sprul pa'i sku gnod sbyin gyi cha lugs 'jigs su rung ba mtha' yas gdug pa rnams 'dul bar bya ba'i phyir /
analyzed: nyid kyi sprul pa'i sku gnod sbyin gyi cha lugs 'jigs su rung ba mtha' yas gdug pa rnams 'dul bar bya ba'i phyir /
translated: In order to subdue the limitless evil ones, he emanates as a terrifying yakṣa.

original: lag na rdo rje mtha' yas pa //🔽dpa' bo gdul dka' 'dul ba po //
analyzed: lag na rdo rje mtha' yas pa // dpa' bo gdul dka' 'dul ba po //
translated: He is the limitless Vajrapāṇis,🔽the heroes who subdue the difficult to subdue,

original: 'jigs su rung dang dpa' byad can //
analyzed: 'jigs su rung dang dpa' byad can //
translated: the terrifying and heroic,

original: rdo rje rtse mo rab 'phro ba //🔽rang gi lag gis gsor byed pa //
analyzed: rdo rje rtse mo rab 'phro ba // rang gi lag gis gsor byed pa //
translated: with the tips of vajras shooting forth,

original: zhes gsungs te /🔽mtha' yas pa zhes pa ni /
analyzed: zhes gsungs te / mtha' yas pa zhes pa ni /
translated: wielding them with their own hands.

original: gsum pa'i don la dang po'i tshig go //
analyzed: gsum pa'i don la dang po'i tshig go //
translated: The phrase “limitless” is a first case [genitive] modifying the third case [ablative].

original: de dag ci ma rungs pa'i sems kyis sam zhe na ma yin te /
analyzed: de dag ci ma rungs pa'i sems kyis sam zhe na ma yin te /
translated: Are they evil-minded? No, it is said:🔽great compassion, wisdom,

original: snying rje che dang shes rab dang // zhes pa la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: snying rje che dang shes rab dang // zhes pa la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: and so forth.

original: thugs rje chen po'i mtshan nyid dang / shes rab dbyer med pa gang la mnga' ba de la de skad ces bya'o //
analyzed: thugs rje chen po'i mtshan nyid dang / shes rab dbyer med pa gang la mnga' ba de la de skad ces bya'o //
translated: He who possesses great compassion and indivisible wisdom is so called.

original: thabs kyis 'gro don byed pa'i mchog / ces pa ni gdul bya rnams ji lta bus 'dul bar mkhyen pas 'dul bar mdzad pa nyid do //
analyzed: thabs kyis 'gro don byed pa'i mchog / ces pa ni gdul bya rnams ji lta bus 'dul bar mkhyen pas 'dul bar mdzad pa nyid do //
translated: The supreme benefactors of beings through skillful means, knowing how to tame the disciples, they tame them.

original: de rnams bdag pos bskul ba ma yin zhing rang rang 'gro ba'i don la dga' zhing mgu ba dang / spro ba'i sems dang ldan pas na /
analyzed: de rnams bdag pos bskul ba ma yin zhing rang rang 'gro ba'i don la dga' zhing mgu ba dang / spro ba'i sems dang ldan pas na /
translated: They are not urged on by a master, but have minds that are happy, pleased, and delighted in going to the benefit of each and every being.

original: dga' mgu rangs pa'i bsam pa can //🔽zhes pas so //
analyzed: dga' mgu rangs pa'i bsam pa can // zhes pas so //
translated: They have the thought of being happy, pleased, and delighted.

original: de dag thams cad kyang khro bo'i gzugs dang ldan pas na /
analyzed: de dag thams cad kyang khro bo'i gzugs dang ldan pas na /
translated: Since all of them have the forms of wrathful ones,

original: khro bo'i lus kyi gzugs ldan pa //
analyzed: khro bo'i lus kyi gzugs ldan pa //
translated: they have the forms of wrathful bodies.

original: zhes bya'o // de dag las ji lta bu zhes brjod ce na /
analyzed: zhes bya'o // de dag las ji lta bu zhes brjod ce na /
translated: What are they like?

original: sangs rgyas phrin las byed pa'i mgon //🔽zhes gsungs te /
analyzed: sangs rgyas phrin las byed pa'i mgon // zhes gsungs te /
translated: They are the lords who perform the buddhas’ activity.

original: sangs rgyas rnams kyi phrin las ni /
analyzed: sangs rgyas rnams kyi phrin las ni /
translated: The activity of the buddhas

original: ma grol ba rnams dgrol bar bya ba dang / ma bskal ba rnams bsgral bar bya ba dang / @237a * //
analyzed: ma grol ba rnams dgrol bar bya ba dang / ma bskal ba rnams bsgral bar bya ba dang / @237a * //
translated: is to liberate those who are not liberated, to liberate those who are not delivered,

original: dbugs mi byung ba rnams dbugs dbyung bar bya ba dang / mya ngan las ma 'das pa rnams mya ngan las 'da' bar mdzad pa nyid do //
analyzed: dbugs mi byung ba rnams dbugs dbyung bar bya ba dang / mya ngan las ma 'das pa rnams mya ngan las 'da' bar mdzad pa nyid do //
translated: to give breath to those who do not breathe, and to bring to nirvana those who have not attained nirvana.

original: de lta bu'i phrin las gang la mnga' ba de la de skad ces bya'o //
analyzed: de lta bu'i phrin las gang la mnga' ba de la de skad ces bya'o //
translated: The one who has such activity is called that.

original: lus btud rnams dang lhan cig tu //
analyzed: lus btud rnams dang lhan cig tu //
translated: Together with those who bowed their bodies.

original: zhes pa ni de lta bu'i 'khor thal mo sbyar nas spyi bo btud de yid gus pa dang ldan pa rnams gsang ba'i bdag po lag na rdo rje dang thabs cig tu bzhugs nas /
analyzed: zhes pa ni de lta bu'i 'khor thal mo sbyar nas spyi bo btud de yid gus pa dang ldan pa rnams gsang ba'i bdag po lag na rdo rje dang thabs cig tu bzhugs nas /
translated: This means that the retinue, with palms joined, bowed their heads and were full of mental respect, and they were present together with the Lord of Secrets, Vajrapani.

original: spyan sngar 'dug ste 'di skad gsol //
analyzed: spyan sngar 'dug ste 'di skad gsol //
translated: Sitting in front of him, they made this request.

original: zhes bya bar 'brel to //
analyzed: zhes bya bar 'brel to //
translated: This is the connection.

original: gang la gsol ba btab ce na /
analyzed: gang la gsol ba btab ce na /
translated: To whom did they make the request?

original: de bzhin gshegs pa bcom ldan 'das //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa bcom ldan 'das //
translated: To the Tathagata, the Blessed One,

original: rdzogs sangs rgyas la zhes gsungs te /
analyzed: rdzogs sangs rgyas la zhes gsungs te /
translated: the perfect Buddha.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa sh'akya thub pa nyid la'o //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa sh'akya thub pa nyid la'o //
translated: This refers to the Tathagata Shakyamuni himself.

original: tshul ji lta bu zhe na phyag 'tshal nas zhes gsungs te /
analyzed: tshul ji lta bu zhe na phyag 'tshal nas zhes gsungs te /
translated: In what manner? It is said, having paid homage.

original: lus dang ngag dang yid kyi sgo nas phyag 'tshal ba nyid do //
analyzed: lus dang ngag dang yid kyi sgo nas phyag 'tshal ba nyid do //
translated: This means paying homage with body, speech, and mind.

original: de nas kyang gus pa'i khyad par du gyur pa ni /
analyzed: de nas kyang gus pa'i khyad par du gyur pa ni /
translated: Then, the special respect is

original: thal mo sbyar bar byas nas ni //🔽zhes gsungs te gong ma la bsnyegs so //
analyzed: thal mo sbyar bar byas nas ni // zhes gsungs te gong ma la bsnyegs so //
translated: having joined palms.🔽This continues from above.

original: spyan sngar 'dug ste 'di skad gsol //
analyzed: spyan sngar 'dug ste 'di skad gsol //
translated: Sitting in front of him, they made this request.

original: zhes pa ni gsang ba'i bdag po nyid nges par gzung ba ste de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyan sngar 'dug nas 'di skad ces gsol ba btab po zhes bya ba nyid do //
analyzed: zhes pa ni gsang ba'i bdag po nyid nges par gzung ba ste de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyan sngar 'dug nas 'di skad ces gsol ba btab po zhes bya ba nyid do //
translated: This is the ascertainment of the Lord of Secrets himself, who, sitting in the presence of the Tathagata, made this request.

original: tshig ji lta bus gsol ba btab ce na /
analyzed: tshig ji lta bus gsol ba btab ce na /
translated: In what words did he make the request?

original: khyab bdag bdag la sman pa dang ; / zhes pa la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: khyab bdag bdag la sman pa dang ; / zhes pa la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: He said, “Lord, for the sake of my benefit and that of others,” and so on.

original: khyab bdag ces pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs rje chen po sems can thams cad la mnyam pa nyid kyi bdag po'i tshul du nges par 'dzin pas na bod pa'i tshig go //
analyzed: khyab bdag ces pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs rje chen po sems can thams cad la mnyam pa nyid kyi bdag po'i tshul du nges par 'dzin pas na bod pa'i tshig go //
translated: “Lord” is the Tibetan word for “ascertainment,” because the great compassion of the Tathagata is ascertained as the lord in the manner of equality toward all sentient beings.

original: gsang ba'i bdag po nyid dus gsum gyi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje 'dzin pa'i ngo bo yin yang 'gro ba'i don du sa bcu'i dbang phyug gi tshul du bzhugs pas na 'bras bu'i don la rag las pa ltar ston na ni /
analyzed: gsang ba'i bdag po nyid dus gsum gyi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje 'dzin pa'i ngo bo yin yang 'gro ba'i don du sa bcu'i dbang phyug gi tshul du bzhugs pas na 'bras bu'i don la rag las pa ltar ston na ni /
translated: Although the Lord of Secrets himself is the essence of the vajra-holder of all the Tathagatas of the three times, he is said to be dependent on the meaning of the result, as if he were abiding in the manner of a lord of the tenth stage for the sake of migrating beings.

original: khyab bdag bdag la sman pa dang // bdag don bdag la thugs brtse'i phyir //
analyzed: khyab bdag bdag la sman pa dang // bdag don bdag la thugs brtse'i phyir //
translated: You are the lord of all, and you are my doctor;🔽You are kind to me, and you are my own benefit.🔽

original: zhes gsungs so //
analyzed: zhes gsungs so //
translated: The Lord of the Sages, for the sake of my welfare, and out of compassion for me, my aim,

original: tshad du bya ba'i tshig gsum gyi 'bras bu gang zhe na snyam pa la /🔽sgyu 'phrul dra ba mngon rdzogs pa'i //
analyzed: tshad du bya ba'i tshig gsum gyi 'bras bu gang zhe na snyam pa la / sgyu 'phrul dra ba mngon rdzogs pa'i //
translated: What is the result of the three phrases that are to be measured?

original: byang chub ci nas bdag thob mdzod //🔽ces gsungs te /🔽theg pa chen po'i 'bras bu nges par bskyed pa'i rgyu /
analyzed: byang chub ci nas bdag thob mdzod // ces gsungs te / theg pa chen po'i 'bras bu nges par bskyed pa'i rgyu /
translated: The result is stated: May I attain enlightenment, the perfection of the magical net.🔽The cause for definitely generating the result of the Mahayana is the great bliss of nondual method and wisdom.

original: thabs dang shes rab gnyis su med pa'i bde ba chen po ni bya ba tshegs chung ngus dngos grub kyi @237b gzugs rnam pa sna tshogs pa skyed par byed pas na sgyu 'phrul zhes bya zhing /
analyzed: thabs dang shes rab gnyis su med pa'i bde ba chen po ni bya ba tshegs chung ngus dngos grub kyi @237b gzugs rnam pa sna tshogs pa skyed par byed pas na sgyu 'phrul zhes bya zhing /
translated: Since it generates the various forms of siddhi with little difficulty, it is called magical.

original: de nyid phyag rgya bzhi'i tshul gyis 'brel pas na dra ba zhes bya ste byed pa po'i tshig go //
analyzed: de nyid phyag rgya bzhi'i tshul gyis 'brel pas na dra ba zhes bya ste byed pa po'i tshig go //
translated: Since it is connected by the method of the four seals, it is called net.

original: de lta bu'i tshul gyis bdag mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa thob par mdzod ces bya zhing /
analyzed: de lta bu'i tshul gyis bdag mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa thob par mdzod ces bya zhing /
translated: Thus, it is said, May I attain the perfection of the magical net, that is, may I attain manifest, perfect enlightenment.

original: ci nas zhes pa ni mi thob tu mi rung ba'i don to //
analyzed: ci nas zhes pa ni mi thob tu mi rung ba'i don to //
translated: The phrase in every way means that it is not suitable to not attain.

original: de nyid bdag gi don gyi dgos pa'o //
analyzed: de nyid bdag gi don gyi dgos pa'o //
translated: That is the purpose of one's own aim.

original: ci sa bcu'i dbang phyug kyang nyan thos kyi nges pa bzhin du bdag gi don 'ba' zhig dang ldan nam zhe na ma yin te /
analyzed: ci sa bcu'i dbang phyug kyang nyan thos kyi nges pa bzhin du bdag gi don 'ba' zhig dang ldan nam zhe na ma yin te /
translated: Is it the case that the lord of the tenth stage is endowed only with one's own aim, like the certainty of the śrāvakas? No, it is not.

original: gzhan don phun sum tshogs pa ni /
analyzed: gzhan don phun sum tshogs pa ni /
translated: The perfection of the aim of others is

original: nyon mongs pas ni sems dkrugs shing //
analyzed: nyon mongs pas ni sems dkrugs shing //
translated: the mind disturbed by afflictions

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: and so on.

original: khams gsum gyi sems can rnams 'dod chags la sogs pa'i mngon par zhen pas sems dkrugs shing /
analyzed: khams gsum gyi sems can rnams 'dod chags la sogs pa'i mngon par zhen pas sems dkrugs shing /
translated: The minds of sentient beings of the three realms are disturbed by the manifest clinging of desire and so on.

original: de'i rkyen gyis 'khor ba'i rgya mtshor mi shes 'dam du bying ba'i sems can kun la zhes bya'o //
analyzed: de'i rkyen gyis 'khor ba'i rgya mtshor mi shes 'dam du bying ba'i sems can kun la zhes bya'o //
translated: Due to that condition, all sentient beings who are sinking in the mud of ignorance in the ocean of saṃsāra are called.

original: de rnams mngon par mtho ba dang nges par legs pa'i lam la gzhag pa ni phan pa zhes bya ste /
analyzed: de rnams mngon par mtho ba dang nges par legs pa'i lam la gzhag pa ni phan pa zhes bya ste /
translated: Establishing them in the path of high rebirth and definite goodness is called benefit.

original: phan pa ni 'bras bu chen po nye bar bsdu ba'i tshig ste /
analyzed: phan pa ni 'bras bu chen po nye bar bsdu ba'i tshig ste /
translated: Benefit is a word that includes a great result.

original: bla med 'bras bu thob bya'i phyir //
analyzed: bla med 'bras bu thob bya'i phyir //
translated: In order to attain the unsurpassed result,

original: zhes bya bar 'brel to //
analyzed: zhes bya bar 'brel to //
translated: This is the connection.

original: de'i phyir gus pa dang ldan pas bstod pa ni /
analyzed: de'i phyir gus pa dang ldan pas bstod pa ni /
translated: Therefore, with respect, the praise is

original: rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das //
analyzed: rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das //
translated: The perfect Buddha, Bhagavan,

original: zhes pa la sogs pa gsungs te ;
analyzed: zhes pa la sogs pa gsungs te ;
translated: and so forth.🔽Having addressed the perfect Buddha, Bhagavan, the special words

original: yang dag pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das zhes bos nas khyad par gyi tshig /'gro ba'i bla ma ston pa po //
analyzed: yang dag pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das zhes bos nas khyad par gyi tshig /'gro ba'i bla ma ston pa po //
translated: are the teacher of the world, the guru.

original: zhes bya'o // de nyid ji lta bu'i mkhyen pa dang ldan zhe na /
analyzed: zhes bya'o // de nyid ji lta bu'i mkhyen pa dang ldan zhe na /
translated: If it is asked with what kind of omniscience is he endowed,

original: dam tshig chen po de nyid mkhyen //🔽dbang po bsam pa mkhyen mchog gis //
analyzed: dam tshig chen po de nyid mkhyen // dbang po bsam pa mkhyen mchog gis //
translated: he is the knower of the great commitment,

original: zhes gsungs te /
analyzed: zhes gsungs te /
translated: the supreme knower of the thoughts and faculties.

original: sngon byang chub na bzhugs pa'i tshe sems can thams cad mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par zhal gyis bzhes pa ni dam tshig chen po'o //
analyzed: sngon byang chub na bzhugs pa'i tshe sems can thams cad mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par zhal gyis bzhes pa ni dam tshig chen po'o //
translated: When he was a bodhisattva in the past, he accepted that all sentient beings are perfect buddhas, which is the great commitment.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa nyid kyis mngon par rtogs pa'i bdag nyid thugs su chud cing sngon gyi smon lam rjes su dran pa ni de nyid mkhyen te /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa nyid kyis mngon par rtogs pa'i bdag nyid thugs su chud cing sngon gyi smon lam rjes su dran pa ni de nyid mkhyen te /
translated: The tathagata himself comprehends the nature of realization and recalls his former aspirations, which is the knowledge of that.

original: nyid kyi yang don zhes bya bar dgongs so //
analyzed: nyid kyi yang don zhes bya bar dgongs so //
translated: The meaning of your own is intended.

original: sems can rnams kyi las ji lta ba bzhin du mkhyen pa ni dbang po bsam pa mkhyen pa dang / mos pa ji lta ba bzhin du mkhyen pa ni bsam pa mkhyen pa ste /
analyzed: sems can rnams kyi las ji lta ba bzhin du mkhyen pa ni dbang po bsam pa mkhyen pa dang / mos pa ji lta ba bzhin du mkhyen pa ni bsam pa mkhyen pa ste /
translated: The knowledge of the karma of sentient beings is the knowledge of the faculties, and the knowledge of the inclinations is the knowledge of the intentions.

original: nyan thos pa la sogs pa ltar gyur pa mi mkhyen pa mi mnga' bas na mchog ces bya'o //🔽gis zhes pa ni byed pa @238a * //
analyzed: nyan thos pa la sogs pa ltar gyur pa mi mkhyen pa mi mnga' bas na mchog ces bya'o // gis zhes pa ni byed pa @238a * //
translated: Since there is nothing that is not known, like the śrāvakas and so on, it is called supreme.

original: po'i tshig ste de lta bu'i yon tan dang ldan pa khyod kyis bshad du gsol zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: po'i tshig ste de lta bu'i yon tan dang ldan pa khyod kyis bshad du gsol zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
translated: The word by is the word for the agent. The meaning is, Please explain by you who possesses such qualities.

original: nges par gsol ba'i don gang ji lta bu snyam pa la /
analyzed: nges par gsol ba'i don gang ji lta bu snyam pa la /
translated: What is the meaning of the request?

original: bcom ldan 'das kyi ye shes sku //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyi ye shes sku //
translated: The wisdom kāya of the Bhagavān...

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: and so on is stated.

original: dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad kyi ye shes ni gnyis su med pa'i bde ba chen po spros pa thams cad dang bral ba nyid de /
analyzed: dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad kyi ye shes ni gnyis su med pa'i bde ba chen po spros pa thams cad dang bral ba nyid de /
translated: The wisdom of all the bhagavān buddhas of the three times is the nondual great bliss free from all proliferation.

original: gzugs sku rnam pa gnyis kyi rten du gyur pas na sku zhes bya ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gong na de las med cing bsngags pa'i tshul gyis dbu la khur bar mdzad pa dang / nges par 'byed pa'i tshig thams cad kyi rtsa bar gyur nas /
analyzed: gzugs sku rnam pa gnyis kyi rten du gyur pas na sku zhes bya ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gong na de las med cing bsngags pa'i tshul gyis dbu la khur bar mdzad pa dang / nges par 'byed pa'i tshig thams cad kyi rtsa bar gyur nas /
translated: It is called “kāya” because it serves as the basis for the two form kāyas.

original: gtsug tor chen po tshig gi bdag / ces bya ba nyid do //
analyzed: gtsug tor chen po tshig gi bdag / ces bya ba nyid do //
translated: It is the great uṣṇīṣa, the lord of words, because it is the root of all the words of discernment.

original: de nyid glo bur ba ma yin zhing rkyen gyi sbyor ba dang bral bas 'od gsal ba rang gi ngo bor zhugs pas na /🔽ye shes sku te rang byung ba //
analyzed: de nyid glo bur ba ma yin zhing rkyen gyi sbyor ba dang bral bas 'od gsal ba rang gi ngo bor zhugs pas na / ye shes sku te rang byung ba //
translated: Since it is not adventitious and is free from the application of conditions, it is the luminous nature of mind.

original: zhes bya'o // 'jam dpal ye shes sems dpa' zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: zhes bya'o // 'jam dpal ye shes sems dpa' zhes bya ba ni /
translated: It is the jñānakāya, the self-originated.

original: stong pa nyid dang snying rje dbyer med pa'i don gyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'jam dpal te /
analyzed: stong pa nyid dang snying rje dbyer med pa'i don gyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'jam dpal te /
translated: Mañjuśrī is the jñānasattva because of the meaning of the inseparability of emptiness and compassion.

original: bde ba chen po'i sku dang ldan pas ye shes nyid dang / rtag tu rgyun mi chad par 'gro ba'i don la mngon par brtson pas na sems dpa' zhes bya zhing brjod par bya ba dang / don gyi dngos po 'brel pas drug pa'i tshig go //
analyzed: bde ba chen po'i sku dang ldan pas ye shes nyid dang / rtag tu rgyun mi chad par 'gro ba'i don la mngon par brtson pas na sems dpa' zhes bya zhing brjod par bya ba dang / don gyi dngos po 'brel pas drug pa'i tshig go //
translated: It is to be expressed as the sixth case, the dative, because of its connection with the entity of the meaning.

original: de nyid dngos po'i rnam par rtog pa dang mtshan ma'i rnam par rtog pa thams cad bral zhing /
analyzed: de nyid dngos po'i rnam par rtog pa dang mtshan ma'i rnam par rtog pa thams cad bral zhing /
translated: It is a name because it is free from all conceptual thoughts of entities and conceptual thoughts of signs.🔽It is a name because it is free from the expressions of both self and other.

original: bdag dang gzhan gnyis kyi brjod pa dang bral bas na ming yin te med pa'i yi ge gnyis so //
analyzed: bdag dang gzhan gnyis kyi brjod pa dang bral bas na ming yin te med pa'i yi ge gnyis so //
translated: It is the two syllables of nonexistence.

original: med pa la phan par 'dod pa'i tshul gyis chos kyi mtshan nyid phyin ci ma log par rtogs pas na /
analyzed: med pa la phan par 'dod pa'i tshul gyis chos kyi mtshan nyid phyin ci ma log par rtogs pas na /
translated: Since it is the unmistaken realization of the characteristics of phenomena through the method of wishing to benefit nonexistence,

original: ming ni yang dag brjod pa'i mchog / ces bya'o //
analyzed: ming ni yang dag brjod pa'i mchog / ces bya'o //
translated: it is the supreme expression of the name.

original: nges par gsol ba'i dan de yon tan ji lta bu dang ldan zhe na /
analyzed: nges par gsol ba'i dan de yon tan ji lta bu dang ldan zhe na /
translated: What kind of qualities does that name definitely possess?

original: don zab don ni rgya che zhing //
analyzed: don zab don ni rgya che zhing //
translated: It is the profound meaning and vast meaning,

original: zhes pa la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: zhes pa la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: and so forth.

original: de la don ni yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyid yin zhing /
analyzed: de la don ni yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyid yin zhing /
translated: The meaning is perfect complete Buddhahood.

original: de grub par byed pa'i thabs la yang don zhes bya'o //
analyzed: de grub par byed pa'i thabs la yang don zhes bya'o //
translated: The means of accomplishing that is also called the meaning.

original: zab ni sa dang pha rol tu phyin pa la sogs pa'i gnyen po'i chos mi ston zhing 'gal ba'i chos kyis rtogs par dka' zhing myur bar 'dod pa'i 'bras bu grub pa nyid do //
analyzed: zab ni sa dang pha rol tu phyin pa la sogs pa'i gnyen po'i chos mi ston zhing 'gal ba'i chos kyis rtogs par dka' zhing myur bar 'dod pa'i 'bras bu grub pa nyid do //
translated: The profound is the accomplishment of the result that is desired quickly, without teaching the antidotes of the levels, transcendent perfections and so on, but by means of contradictory practices.

original: don rgya che ba ni theg @238b pa chen po'i sems kyis sems can ma lus pa'i don la mngon par brtson pa'o //
analyzed: don rgya che ba ni theg @238b pa chen po'i sems kyis sems can ma lus pa'i don la mngon par brtson pa'o //
translated: The vast meaning is the striving for the sake of all sentient beings with the mind of the Great Vehicle.

original: don chen mtshungs med rab zhi ba //🔽zhes pa de ltar bdag dang gzhan gyi don phun sum tshogs par grub pa ni /
analyzed: don chen mtshungs med rab zhi ba // zhes pa de ltar bdag dang gzhan gyi don phun sum tshogs par grub pa ni /
translated: The great meaning is unequaled and utterly peaceful.

original: nyan thos la sogs pa ltar bdag gi don 'ba' zhig ma yin pas mtshungs pa med cing de nyid bde ba chen po'i tshul gyis rnam par rtog pa thams cad zhi bar byed pas na rab zhi ba zhes bya ba nyid do //
analyzed: nyan thos la sogs pa ltar bdag gi don 'ba' zhig ma yin pas mtshungs pa med cing de nyid bde ba chen po'i tshul gyis rnam par rtog pa thams cad zhi bar byed pas na rab zhi ba zhes bya ba nyid do //
translated: Thus, the accomplishment of the perfect fulfillment of one's own and others' goals is not just for one's own benefit, like that of the sravakas and so on, so it is unequaled. And since it is the method of great bliss, it is called utterly peaceful because it pacifies all concepts.

original: ci de nyan thos la sogs pa ltar rgyu dang lam sdug bsngal ba nyid kyis byang chub sgrub bam zhe na ma yin te /
analyzed: ci de nyan thos la sogs pa ltar rgyu dang lam sdug bsngal ba nyid kyis byang chub sgrub bam zhe na ma yin te /
translated: Is enlightenment achieved by the cause and path of suffering, as in the case of the sravakas and so forth? No, it is not.

original: thog ma bar dang mthar dge ba //
analyzed: thog ma bar dang mthar dge ba //
translated: It is virtuous in the beginning, middle, and end.

original: zhes gsungs te /
analyzed: zhes gsungs te /
translated: This is stated.

original: de la thog mar dge ba ni sgrub pa thabs dang shes rab snyoms par 'jug pa'i tshul gyis so //
analyzed: de la thog mar dge ba ni sgrub pa thabs dang shes rab snyoms par 'jug pa'i tshul gyis so //
translated: Among these, it is virtuous in the beginning because it is achieved through the method of the union of means and wisdom.

original: bar du dge ba ni rgyu sgrub pa nyid kyi mnyam par gzhag pa'i bde ba rgyun du sgom pa yin la /
analyzed: bar du dge ba ni rgyu sgrub pa nyid kyi mnyam par gzhag pa'i bde ba rgyun du sgom pa yin la /
translated: It is virtuous in the middle because it is the meditation on the bliss of equipoise that is the cause of achievement itself.

original: des bsgrubs pa'i 'bras bu chos kyi sku ni mtha' mar dge ba zhes bya ba nyid do //
analyzed: des bsgrubs pa'i 'bras bu chos kyi sku ni mtha' mar dge ba zhes bya ba nyid do //
translated: The result achieved by that, the dharmakaya, is called virtuous in the end.

original: zab mo'i don 'di nyid da ltar gyi ston pa sh'akya thub pa kho nas gsungs sam zhe na ma yin te /
analyzed: zab mo'i don 'di nyid da ltar gyi ston pa sh'akya thub pa kho nas gsungs sam zhe na ma yin te /
translated: Was this profound meaning taught only by the present teacher, Shakyamuni? No, it was not.

original: 'das pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis gsungs //
analyzed: 'das pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis gsungs //
translated: The buddhas of the past have taught it.

original: ma 'ongs rnams kyang gsung 'gyur la //
analyzed: ma 'ongs rnams kyang gsung 'gyur la //
translated: The buddhas of the future will teach it.

original: da ltar byung ba'i rdzogs sangs rgyas //
analyzed: da ltar byung ba'i rdzogs sangs rgyas //
translated: The perfect buddhas of the present

original: yang dang yang du gsung ba gang //🔽zhes gsungs te /
analyzed: yang dang yang du gsung ba gang //🔽zhes gsungs te /
translated: teach it again and again.

original: 'das pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa mar me mdzad gcig pus kyang ma yin te /
analyzed: 'das pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa mar me mdzad gcig pus kyang ma yin te /
translated: It is not just the past Tathāgata Dīpaṃkara,

original: da ltar gyi de bzhin gshegs pa sh'akya thub pas kyang ma yin /
analyzed: da ltar gyi de bzhin gshegs pa sh'akya thub pas kyang ma yin /
translated: nor the present Tathāgata Śākyamuni,

original: ma 'ongs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa byams pas kyang ma yin zhing /
analyzed: ma 'ongs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa byams pas kyang ma yin zhing /
translated: nor the future Tathāgata Maitreya,

original: 'das pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis kyang 'di nyid gsungs la /
analyzed: 'das pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis kyang 'di nyid gsungs la /
translated: but the past Tathāgatas also taught just this,

original: da ltar gyi de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis kyang 'di nyid gsungs pa dang / ma 'ongs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis kyang 'di nyid gsungs bar 'gyur ro zhes bya bar dgongs so //
analyzed: da ltar gyi de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis kyang 'di nyid gsungs pa dang / ma 'ongs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis kyang 'di nyid gsungs bar 'gyur ro zhes bya bar dgongs so //
translated: and the present Tathāgatas also teach just this, and the future Tathāgatas will also teach just this.

original: da ltar 'di rgyud gang las gsungs she na /
analyzed: da ltar 'di rgyud gang las gsungs she na /
translated: In what tantra was this taught?

original: rgyud chen sgyu 'phrul dra ba las //🔽zhes gsungs te /
analyzed: rgyud chen sgyu 'phrul dra ba las // zhes gsungs te /
translated: From the great tantra Net of Illusory Manifestations.

original: rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po sgyu 'phrul dra ba le'u khri drug stong pa las gsungs zhes bya ba nyid do //
analyzed: rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po sgyu 'phrul dra ba le'u khri drug stong pa las gsungs zhes bya ba nyid do //
translated: It is taught in the great king of tantras, the Net of Illusory Manifestations, in 16,000 chapters.

original: de ji lta bu'i tshul du gsungs she na /
analyzed: de ji lta bu'i tshul du gsungs she na /
translated: In what way was it taught?

original: rdo rje 'chang chen gsang sngags 'chang //
analyzed: rdo rje 'chang chen gsang sngags 'chang //
translated: Great Vajradhara, the holder of secret mantra,

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /🔽de la rdo rje 'chang chen po ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi thugs kyi ngo bo sems dpa' dang / gsang sngags 'chang ba ni de'i @239a * //
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te / de la rdo rje 'chang chen po ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi thugs kyi ngo bo sems dpa' dang / gsang sngags 'chang ba ni de'i @239a * //
translated: and so forth.

original: 'khor du gyur pa'i rdo rje'i rigs kyi bdag nyid can rnams so //🔽dpag med rnams kyis dga' bzhin du //
analyzed: 'khor du gyur pa'i rdo rje'i rigs kyi bdag nyid can rnams so // dpag med rnams kyis dga' bzhin du //
translated: Therein, Great Vajradhara is the essence of the mind of all buddhas, the being, and the holder of secret mantra is those with the nature of the vajra family who are in his retinue.

original: zhes pa ni 'khor de lta bu 'jig rten khams kyi rdul phra rab dang mnyam pa mtshungs pa med pa rnams kyis bde ba chen po dang ldan pas 'gro ba'i don du gsungs so zhes bya ba nyid do //
analyzed: zhes pa ni 'khor de lta bu 'jig rten khams kyi rdul phra rab dang mnyam pa mtshungs pa med pa rnams kyis bde ba chen po dang ldan pas 'gro ba'i don du gsungs so zhes bya ba nyid do //
translated: The phrase with immeasurable ones joyfully means that for the benefit of beings, it was taught by those who possess great bliss, who are equal to the number of atoms in the world systems, who are incomparable.

original: de nyid bre mo'i tshul du gsungs pa ma yin pa ni /
analyzed: de nyid bre mo'i tshul du gsungs pa ma yin pa ni /
translated: The phrase not as a joke means that it was not taught as a joke.

original: glur blangs gang lags bshad du gsol //🔽zhes gsungs so //
analyzed: glur blangs gang lags bshad du gsol // zhes gsungs so //
translated: Please explain the songs.

original: de la glu ni rdo rje'i glu zab mo'i don rdo rje'i tshig tu gsungs pa yin zhing /
analyzed: de la glu ni rdo rje'i glu zab mo'i don rdo rje'i tshig tu gsungs pa yin zhing /
translated: Therein, a song is a profound vajra song, taught in vajra words with profound meaning.

original: yon tan gyi tshogs bdag tu byas pas /
analyzed: yon tan gyi tshogs bdag tu byas pas /
translated: Since the assembly of qualities is made into the self,

original: de kho na nyid kyi don rtogs par byed pas na glu zhes bya pa yin la /
analyzed: de kho na nyid kyi don rtogs par byed pas na glu zhes bya pa yin la /
translated: it is called a song because it causes the realization of the meaning of reality.

original: de gang yin pa de bdag la bshad du gsol zhes bya ba nyid do //
analyzed: de gang yin pa de bdag la bshad du gsol zhes bya ba nyid do //
translated: That is what is being said by “please explain that to me.”

original: zhu ba po rang gi dogs pa bsal ba'i phyir /🔽mgon po rdzogs sangs rgyas kun gyi //
analyzed: zhu ba po rang gi dogs pa bsal ba'i phyir / mgon po rdzogs sangs rgyas kun gyi //
translated: In order to clear up the doubts of the petitioner,🔽it is said:🔽In order for me to become

original: gsang 'dzin ci nas bdag 'gyur phyir //🔽zhes gsungs te /
analyzed: gsang 'dzin ci nas bdag 'gyur phyir // zhes gsungs te /
translated: the guardian who holds the secrets of all perfect buddhas,

original: phyogs bcu dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs kyi gsang ba'i bdag po bdag yin pa'i phyir na zab don gyi snod yin zhes bya ba nyid da /
analyzed: phyogs bcu dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs kyi gsang ba'i bdag po bdag yin pa'i phyir na zab don gyi snod yin zhes bya ba nyid da /
translated: Since I am the lord of the secrets of the body, speech, and mind of all buddhas of the three times and the ten directions, it is said that I am a vessel of the profound meaning.

original: de nyid ma 'ongs pa'i tshig tu ston kyang 'das pa dang da ltar gsum gyi bdag po yin zhes bya ba nyid do //
analyzed: de nyid ma 'ongs pa'i tshig tu ston kyang 'das pa dang da ltar gsum gyi bdag po yin zhes bya ba nyid do //
translated: Although that is taught in the future tense, it is said that I am the lord of the past and the present.

original: nges par 'byung gi bar du 'di //
analyzed: nges par 'byung gi bar du 'di //
translated: Until I attain liberation,

original: bdag gis bsam pa brtan bos gzung //
analyzed: bdag gis bsam pa brtan bos gzung //
translated: I will hold this thought firmly.

original: zhes pa ni theg pa chen po gsang sngags kyi nges pa'i lam zab mo 'di bdag nyid yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob kyi bar du som nyi dang rnam par bral bas mi spyom pa'i tshul gyis brtan par gzung zhes bya ba nyid do //
analyzed: zhes pa ni theg pa chen po gsang sngags kyi nges pa'i lam zab mo 'di bdag nyid yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob kyi bar du som nyi dang rnam par bral bas mi spyom pa'i tshul gyis brtan par gzung zhes bya ba nyid do //
translated: This means that one should firmly hold this profound and definitive path of the Mahayana Secret Mantra, without wavering due to doubt, until one has attained perfect and complete enlightenment.

original: bdag nyid nges pa'i ye shes dang ldan nas 'gro ba gzhan la yang dag par phan pa'i tshul gyis ston par 'dod pa ni /
analyzed: bdag nyid nges pa'i ye shes dang ldan nas 'gro ba gzhan la yang dag par phan pa'i tshul gyis ston par 'dod pa ni /
translated: With the wish to teach others, having gained the wisdom of certainty, one should teach in a way that is truly beneficial.

original: nyon mongs ma lus bsal ba dang // mi shes ma lus spangs pa'i phyir //
analyzed: nyon mongs ma lus bsal ba dang // mi shes ma lus spangs pa'i phyir //
translated: In order to eliminate all afflictions and to abandon all ignorance,

original: bsam pa'i khyad par ji bzhin du //
analyzed: bsam pa'i khyad par ji bzhin du //
translated: in accordance with the distinctions of their thoughts,

original: sems can rnams la bshad par 'tshal //🔽zhes gsungs te //
analyzed: sems can rnams la bshad par 'tshal //🔽zhes gsungs te //
translated: I will explain to sentient beings.

original: khams gsum gyi sems can rnams 'bras bu nyon mongs pa sred pa dang nga rgyal la sogs pa sdug bsngal rnam pa sna tshogs pa rnams bsal ba dang / rtsa ba'i nyon mongs pa ma rig pa las bzlog pa'i phyir theg pa chen po'i don mngon par dad pa rnams dang zhi ba'i sems dang ldan pa rnams la @239b ji lta ba bzhin du nges pa dang ma nges pa'i tshul du bshad par 'dod ces pa nyid
analyzed: khams gsum gyi sems can rnams 'bras bu nyon mongs pa sred pa dang nga rgyal la sogs pa sdug bsngal rnam pa sna tshogs pa rnams bsal ba dang / rtsa ba'i nyon mongs pa ma rig pa las bzlog pa'i phyir theg pa chen po'i don mngon par dad pa rnams dang zhi ba'i sems dang ldan pa rnams la @239b ji lta ba bzhin du nges pa dang ma nges pa'i tshul du bshad par 'dod ces pa nyid
translated: In order to remove the various kinds of suffering of the beings of the three realms, such as craving and pride, which are the results of the afflictions, and in order to turn them away from the fundamental affliction of ignorance, for those who have clear faith in the meaning of the Mahayana and who possess a peaceful mind, I wish to explain in accordance with the definitive and provisional methods.

original: do // gsang dbang lag na rdo rje yis //
analyzed: do // gsang dbang lag na rdo rje yis //
translated: The one with the secret empowerment, Vajrapāṇi,

original: de bzhin gshegs la de skad du //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs la de skad du //
translated: having made such a request to the Tathāgata,

original: gsol nas thal mo sbyar byas te //
analyzed: gsol nas thal mo sbyar byas te //
translated: with palms joined,🔽bowed his body and sat in his presence.

original: lus btud nas ni spyan sngar 'dug / ces pa ni gong du smos pa'i zhu ba'i tshig de lta bus de bzhin gshegs pa la gsol ba btab nas gus pa dang ldan pa'i tshul gyis spyan sngar 'dug ces bya ba nyid do //
analyzed: lus btud nas ni spyan sngar 'dug / ces pa ni gong du smos pa'i zhu ba'i tshig de lta bus de bzhin gshegs pa la gsol ba btab nas gus pa dang ldan pa'i tshul gyis spyan sngar 'dug ces bya ba nyid do //
translated: Having made such a request to the Tathāgata with the words of request mentioned above, he sat in his presence with a respectful manner.

original: de nas bcom ldan sh'akya thub //
analyzed: de nas bcom ldan sh'akya thub //
translated: Then the Lord, the Sage of the Shakyas,

original: ces pa la sogs pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i che ba'i yon tan brjod pa ste /
analyzed: ces pa la sogs pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i che ba'i yon tan brjod pa ste /
translated: This and the following passages describe the great qualities of the Tathagata.

original: de la yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das lha dang mi rnams kyi mchog ces pa nyid do //
analyzed: de la yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das lha dang mi rnams kyi mchog ces pa nyid do //
translated: Here, the perfect Buddha, the Blessed One, the best of gods and men is just that.

original: nyid kyi zhal nas ljags bzang ba //
analyzed: nyid kyi zhal nas ljags bzang ba //
translated: His tongue is good,

original: ring zhing yangs pa brkyang mdzad de //
analyzed: ring zhing yangs pa brkyang mdzad de //
translated: long and broad,

original: ces pa ni brgyud pa'i sgo nas chos ston pa yin zhing /
analyzed: ces pa ni brgyud pa'i sgo nas chos ston pa yin zhing /
translated: This is the teaching of the Dharma through lineage.

original: nyid kyis legs pa'i 'bras bu dang ldan pa'i chos ston pas na ljags bzang can zhes pa ste /
analyzed: nyid kyis legs pa'i 'bras bu dang ldan pa'i chos ston pas na ljags bzang can zhes pa ste /
translated: Since he teaches the Dharma endowed with the fruit of goodness, he is called the one with the good tongue.

original: 'jig rten khas smras pa'i tshig bzang po la yang khas bzang zhes pa lta bu'o //
analyzed: 'jig rten khas smras pa'i tshig bzang po la yang khas bzang zhes pa lta bu'o //
translated: For example, good tongue is like good speech in worldly speech.

original: ring zhing yangs pa brkyang mdzad de //
analyzed: ring zhing yangs pa brkyang mdzad de //
translated: Long and broad,

original: zhes pa ni bskal pa dpag tu med pa nas bsags pa'i nyon mongs pa sel bar mdzad pas na ring ba dang / de nyid 'gro ba ma lus pa la phan par 'dod pas na yangs pa ste /
analyzed: zhes pa ni bskal pa dpag tu med pa nas bsags pa'i nyon mongs pa sel bar mdzad pas na ring ba dang / de nyid 'gro ba ma lus pa la phan par 'dod pas na yangs pa ste /
translated: Since it is the desire to benefit all beings, it is vast.

original: de mtshon pa'i dbyibs kyis ljags la yang de skad bya ba nyid do //
analyzed: de mtshon pa'i dbyibs kyis ljags la yang de skad bya ba nyid do //
translated: The shape that illustrates that is also called the tongue.

original: seng ge glal ba la sogs pa lta bu ni ma yin pa nyid do //
analyzed: seng ge glal ba la sogs pa lta bu ni ma yin pa nyid do //
translated: It is not like a lion yawning and so on.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung de nyid yon tan ji lta bu dang ldan zhe na /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung de nyid yon tan ji lta bu dang ldan zhe na /
translated: What kind of qualities does that speech of the Tathagata possess?

original: 'jig rten gsum po snang byed cing //🔽zhes gsungs te /
analyzed: 'jig rten gsum po snang byed cing // zhes gsungs te /
translated: Illuminating the three worlds.

original: de la 'jig rten gsum ni 'dod pa dang gzugs dang gzugs med pa gsum yin /
analyzed: de la 'jig rten gsum ni 'dod pa dang gzugs dang gzugs med pa gsum yin /
translated: The three worlds are the three: desire, form, and formless.

original: de rnams kyi ma rig pa'i mun pa sel bar byed pas na snang byed cing zhes bya'o //🔽de nyid 'dod chags la sogs pa /
analyzed: de rnams kyi ma rig pa'i mun pa sel bar byed pas na snang byed cing zhes bya'o // de nyid 'dod chags la sogs pa /
translated: Since it removes the darkness of ignorance in those, it is called illuminating.🔽That itself is the subjugator of the enemies

original: bdud bzhi'i dgra rnams 'dul byed pa //
analyzed: bdud bzhi'i dgra rnams 'dul byed pa //
translated: of the four demons such as attachment.

original: zhes pa lha'i bu'i bdud la sogs pa rnam pa bzhi 'dul bar byed pa ste /
analyzed: zhes pa lha'i bu'i bdud la sogs pa rnam pa bzhi 'dul bar byed pa ste /
translated: This is the subjugation of the four types of demons, such as the son of a god.

original: rgan pa dang nad drag po rnams te de spong bar byed ces bya ba'i don to //🔽sems can rnams kyi ngan song gsum //
analyzed: rgan pa dang nad drag po rnams te de spong bar byed ces bya ba'i don to // sems can rnams kyi ngan song gsum //
translated: The old and the sick are the ones who are to be abandoned.

original: sbyong bar byed pa'i 'dzum bstan nas //
analyzed: sbyong bar byed pa'i 'dzum bstan nas //
translated: He, having shown a smile,🔽purifies the three miserable realms of sentient beings.

original: zhes pa ni phyin ci log gis bskyed pa'i srid pa la sogs pa ngan 'gro rnam pa gsum gyi rgyud sbyong bar byed pa la skyes pa'i @240a * //
analyzed: zhes pa ni phyin ci log gis bskyed pa'i srid pa la sogs pa ngan 'gro rnam pa gsum gyi rgyud sbyong bar byed pa la skyes pa'i @240a * //
translated: This is the smile that purifies the three miserable realms, such as existence, which are generated by error.

original: tshul gyis zhal nges bar bshad pa nyid do //🔽tshangs pa'i gsung ni snyan pa yis //
analyzed: tshul gyis zhal nges bar bshad pa nyid do // tshangs pa'i gsung ni snyan pa yis //
translated: The way of birth is the very explanation of the face.🔽Having filled the three worlds

original: 'jig rten gsum po kun bkang nas //
analyzed: 'jig rten gsum po kun bkang nas //
translated: with the pleasant speech of Brahma,

original: zhes pa la tshangs pa ni rnam par rtog pa'i tshogs mtha' dag dang bral ba yin te /
analyzed: zhes pa la tshangs pa ni rnam par rtog pa'i tshogs mtha' dag dang bral ba yin te /
translated: Brahma is free from the entire multitude of conceptual thoughts.

original: gsung snyan pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i bka' phan bar 'dod pa'i tshig can no //
analyzed: gsung snyan pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i bka' phan bar 'dod pa'i tshig can no //
translated: Pleasant speech is the speech of the Tathagata, which has words that desire benefit.

original: 'jig rten gyi khams gsum po ma lus pa nyid de kun bkang zhes 'das pa'i sgrar gsungs kyi /
analyzed: 'jig rten gyi khams gsum po ma lus pa nyid de kun bkang zhes 'das pa'i sgrar gsungs kyi /
translated: The entire three worlds are filled with that sound.

original: gsung de nyid snying rje che dang zhes bya ba la sogs pa nyid yin zhing /
analyzed: gsung de nyid snying rje che dang zhes bya ba la sogs pa nyid yin zhing /
translated: That sound itself is endowed with great compassion, etc.

original: seng ge'i nga ro lta bu nyid ma yin pa nyid do //
analyzed: seng ge'i nga ro lta bu nyid ma yin pa nyid do //
translated: It is not like the lion's roar.

original: de gang la gsungs she na /
analyzed: de gang la gsungs she na /
translated: To whom was it spoken?

original: lag na rdo rje stobs po che //🔽gsang dbang la ni slar gsungs pa //
analyzed: lag na rdo rje stobs po che // gsang dbang la ni slar gsungs pa //
translated: To Vajrapani, the Great Powerful One.

original: slar zhes bya ba ni lan gyi tshig ces bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: slar zhes bya ba ni lan gyi tshig ces bya ba'i don to //
translated: The word again means in reply.

original: gong gi tshangs pa'i gsung de nyid bstan pa'i phyir /🔽snying rje che dang ldan gyur pa //
analyzed: gong gi tshangs pa'i gsung de nyid bstan pa'i phyir / snying rje che dang ldan gyur pa //
translated: In order to demonstrate that very Brahma voice, it is said:

original: zhes pa la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: zhes pa la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: Endowed with great compassion, etc.

original: zhu ba po de nyid gzhan gyi don la mngon par brtson pa'i sems dang ldan pa ni snying rje chen po'o //
analyzed: zhu ba po de nyid gzhan gyi don la mngon par brtson pa'i sems dang ldan pa ni snying rje chen po'o //
translated: The petitioner himself, endowed with a mind striving for the benefit of others, is great compassion.

original: de nyid gang zhe na /
analyzed: de nyid gang zhe na /
translated: What is that?

original: 'gro la phan pa'i don du khyod //
analyzed: 'gro la phan pa'i don du khyod //
translated: For the sake of benefiting beings, etc.

original: ces gsungs te de ched du bya ba'i ma ning gi rtags kyis ston pa po dang zhu ba po gnyi ga la sbyar zhing /
analyzed: ces gsungs te de ched du bya ba'i ma ning gi rtags kyis ston pa po dang zhu ba po gnyi ga la sbyar zhing /
translated: This is taught by the sign of the neuter, which applies to both the teacher and the questioner.

original: khyod ces pa ni bdun pa'i don la dang po'i tshig go //
analyzed: khyod ces pa ni bdun pa'i don la dang po'i tshig go //
translated: The word “you” is the first case, the dative.

original: zhus pa'i don de nyid la de bzhin gshegs pa mngon par dga' ba dang ldan par bstan pa ni /
analyzed: zhus pa'i don de nyid la de bzhin gshegs pa mngon par dga' ba dang ldan par bstan pa ni /
translated: The meaning of the question is taught by the Tathāgata with delight.

original: ye shes lus can 'jam dpal gyi //
analyzed: ye shes lus can 'jam dpal gyi //
translated: The body of pristine consciousness is Mañjuśrī.

original: zhes pa la sogs pa ste de la ye shes ni spros pa thams cad dang bral ba gnyis su med pa'i ye shes bde ba chen po yin la /
analyzed: zhes pa la sogs pa ste de la ye shes ni spros pa thams cad dang bral ba gnyis su med pa'i ye shes bde ba chen po yin la /
translated: Pristine consciousness is the great bliss of nondual pristine consciousness free from all conceptual elaborations.

original: de nyid sprul pa sna tshogs pa rnams kyi rten yin pas na lus zhes bya la ldan pa'i sgra ni tshig gi tshogs de nyid la de'i don 'di nyid do //
analyzed: de nyid sprul pa sna tshogs pa rnams kyi rten yin pas na lus zhes bya la ldan pa'i sgra ni tshig gi tshogs de nyid la de'i don 'di nyid do //
translated: Since that is the support of the various emanations, it is called the “body.” The word “endowed” in the root text has the same meaning as the word “possessing” in the commentary.

original: 'jam dpal ni thabs dang shes rab gnyis su med pa'i bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs rdzogs par byed pa ste /
analyzed: 'jam dpal ni thabs dang shes rab gnyis su med pa'i bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs rdzogs par byed pa ste /
translated: Mañjuśrī is the one who perfects the accumulations of merit and pristine consciousness, which are the nondual method and wisdom.

original: de yang le'u dang po las /
analyzed: de yang le'u dang po las /
translated: Also, in the first chapter of the tantra, it says:

original: ma ni rtogs med shes rab ste //
analyzed: ma ni rtogs med shes rab ste //
translated: Ma is non-conceptual wisdom.

original: na ni gnyis med bde ba ste //
analyzed: na ni gnyis med bde ba ste //
translated: Na is the bliss of non-duality.

original: dza ni 'gro la thugs rje'i bdag / au ni thabs su yang dag bcas //🔽shr'i ni bsod nams ye shes kyi //
analyzed: dza ni 'gro la thugs rje'i bdag / au ni thabs su yang dag bcas // shr'i ni bsod nams ye shes kyi //
translated: Ja is the lord of compassion for beings. O is the one who is truly endowed with skillful means.

original: tshogs rdzogs pa ru mdzad pas na //🔽mi skye chos can thams cad kyi //🔽'jam dpal bdag nyid chen po yin //
analyzed: tshogs rdzogs pa ru mdzad pas na // mi skye chos can thams cad kyi // 'jam dpal bdag nyid chen po yin //
translated: Shri is the one who accomplishes the accumulations of merit and wisdom.

original: zhes gsungs pa'i phyir ro //🔽ming @240b brjod pas ni don che ba //
analyzed: zhes gsungs pa'i phyir ro // ming @240b brjod pas ni don che ba //
translated: Therefore, the great being Manjushri is the one who has the nature of non-arising for all.

original: zhes pa ni de lta bu'i 'jam dpal de tshig gi brjod pa dang bral kyang tshig gi brjod pa dang / de nyid don chen po dang ldan pa gang yin pa de la de skad ces bya'o //🔽dag par byed cing sdig sel ba //
analyzed: zhes pa ni de lta bu'i 'jam dpal de tshig gi brjod pa dang bral kyang tshig gi brjod pa dang / de nyid don chen po dang ldan pa gang yin pa de la de skad ces bya'o // dag par byed cing sdig sel ba //
translated: As for the line By expressing the name, it has great meaning, it refers to Manjushri, who is free from verbal expression but is endowed with great meaning, which is expressed in words.

original: zhes bya ba ni don gyi mtshan nyid de lta bu bag chags kyi dri ma rnam par dag par byed cing sdig pa sel bar mdzad pa nyid de rgyu 'bras kyi tshul gyis bstan pa'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni don gyi mtshan nyid de lta bu bag chags kyi dri ma rnam par dag par byed cing sdig pa sel bar mdzad pa nyid de rgyu 'bras kyi tshul gyis bstan pa'o //
translated: As for the line It purifies and removes negativity, it refers to the characteristic of the meaning, which purifies the stains of habitual tendencies and removes negativity. This is taught in terms of cause and effect.

original: nga las nyan par brtson pa ni //
analyzed: nga las nyan par brtson pa ni //
translated: He who strives to listen from me

original: zhes pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa nyid las nyan par 'dod pa ni zhes bya bar sbyar te /🔽legs so dpal ldan rdo rje 'chang //
analyzed: zhes pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa nyid las nyan par 'dod pa ni zhes bya bar sbyar te / legs so dpal ldan rdo rje 'chang //
translated: is to be connected with “he who desires to listen from the Tathāgata himself.”🔽Excellent, glorious Vajra Holder!

original: lag na rdo rje khyod legs so //
analyzed: lag na rdo rje khyod legs so //
translated: Vajrapāṇi, you are excellent!

original: zhes pa ni de lta bu'i zab mo'i don 'gro ba la phan par 'dod pa'i tshul gyis nga las nyan pa ni kye rdo rje 'chang khyod legs so legs so khyod ces mngon par dgyes pa'i tshul gyis bstod pa'o //
analyzed: zhes pa ni de lta bu'i zab mo'i don 'gro ba la phan par 'dod pa'i tshul gyis nga las nyan pa ni kye rdo rje 'chang khyod legs so legs so khyod ces mngon par dgyes pa'i tshul gyis bstod pa'o //
translated: This is a praise in the manner of manifest delight, saying “Excellent, excellent, you” to Vajrapāṇi, who strives to listen from me in the manner of desiring to benefit migrating beings with such profound meaning.

original: gsang ba'i bdag po de phyir ngas //
analyzed: gsang ba'i bdag po de phyir ngas //
translated: Lord of Secrets, therefore

original: khyod la legs par bstan par bya //
analyzed: khyod la legs par bstan par bya //
translated: I will teach it well to you.

original: zhes bya ba la gsang ba'i bdag po ni gong du bshad zin la /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la gsang ba'i bdag po ni gong du bshad zin la /
translated: The Lord of Secrets has been explained above.

original: de phyir zhes bya ba ni ched du bya ba ma yin gyi rtags can yin zhing /
analyzed: de phyir zhes bya ba ni ched du bya ba ma yin gyi rtags can yin zhing /
translated: Therefore means it is a reason, not a purpose.

original: ngas khyod la phyin ci ma log pa'i tshul gyis 'bras bu bzang po byin pa bstan par bya'o zhes pa ste /
analyzed: ngas khyod la phyin ci ma log pa'i tshul gyis 'bras bu bzang po byin pa bstan par bya'o zhes pa ste /
translated: I will teach you the bestowal of the excellent result in an unmistaken manner.

original: bstan par bya zhes pa ni phyed pa'i tshig la dang po'i don to //
analyzed: bstan par bya zhes pa ni phyed pa'i tshig la dang po'i don to //
translated: The phrase should be taught is a gerundive, meaning should be done.

original: khyod ni rtse gcig yid kyis nyon //
analyzed: khyod ni rtse gcig yid kyis nyon //
translated: You should listen with one-pointed mind.

original: zhes pa ni zhu ba po nyid bsam pa gcig pa dang ldan pas chos kyi 'khor lo lan gnyis pa bskor cig ces bya ba nyid do //
analyzed: zhes pa ni zhu ba po nyid bsam pa gcig pa dang ldan pas chos kyi 'khor lo lan gnyis pa bskor cig ces bya ba nyid do //
translated: This means that the petitioner himself, endowed with a single thought, should turn the wheel of Dharma a second time.

original: de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i bka' yin la /
analyzed: de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i bka' yin la /
translated: These are the words of the Tathagata.

original: bcom ldan de ni legs zhes gsol //
analyzed: bcom ldan de ni legs zhes gsol //
translated: Blessed One, that is excellent!

original: zhes pa ni zhu ba po dang sdud pa po'i tshig 'dres pa ste /
analyzed: zhes pa ni zhu ba po dang sdud pa po'i tshig 'dres pa ste /
translated: This is a mixture of the words of the petitioner and the compiler.

original: bcom ldan de ni legs zhes pa ni kye bcom ldan 'das legs zhes pa ste zhu ba po'i tshig go zhes gsol zhes pa ni /
analyzed: bcom ldan de ni legs zhes pa ni kye bcom ldan 'das legs zhes pa ste zhu ba po'i tshig go zhes gsol zhes pa ni /
translated: The phrase Blessed One, that is excellent! is the petitioner's words, saying Blessed One, that is excellent! The phrase he said

original: de skad ces gsol zhes pa ste sdud pa po'i tshig go //
analyzed: de skad ces gsol zhes pa ste sdud pa po'i tshig go //
translated: is the compiler's words, saying he said that.

original: de nas bcom ldan sh'akya thub //
analyzed: de nas bcom ldan sh'akya thub //
translated: Then the Bhagavān Śākyamuni,

original: ces pa la sogs pa ni sdud pa po'i tshig ste /
analyzed: ces pa la sogs pa ni sdud pa po'i tshig ste /
translated: and so on, are the words of the compiler.

original: 'di lta bu'i don thugs la bzhag nas /
analyzed: 'di lta bu'i don thugs la bzhag nas /
translated: Having placed such a meaning in his mind,

original: de dang ldan pa'i sngags 'di gsungs so zhes bya bar 'brel to //
analyzed: de dang ldan pa'i sngags 'di gsungs so zhes bya bar 'brel to //
translated: he spoke this mantra endowed with that, is the connection.

original: de la don gyi mtshan nyid ni ji lta bu zhig dang ldan snyam pa dang / gsang sngags rigs chen thams cad dang // zhes bya ba gsungs te /
analyzed: de la don gyi mtshan nyid ni ji lta bu zhig dang ldan snyam pa dang / gsang sngags rigs chen thams cad dang // zhes bya ba gsungs te /
translated: And all great classes of secret mantra is stated.

original: sngags 'di yid skyob par byed pa dang gsang ba ni de nyid bde ba @241a * //
analyzed: sngags 'di yid skyob par byed pa dang gsang ba ni de nyid bde ba @241a * //
translated: This mantra protects the mind and is secret, taught by the method of great bliss.

original: chen po'i tshul gyis bstan pa ste rigs kyi grangs ni /
analyzed: chen po'i tshul gyis bstan pa ste rigs kyi grangs ni /
translated: The enumeration of the classes is:

original: yongs su dag pa'i thabs dang bcas //
analyzed: yongs su dag pa'i thabs dang bcas //
translated: together with the method of complete purification.🔽The essence of all tathagatas,

original: de bzhin gshegs kun snying po dang // phrag ma gnyis dang yig 'bru gsum //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs kun snying po dang // phrag ma gnyis dang yig 'bru gsum //
translated: two shoulders, and three syllables,🔽the bhagavat, the one with the form of wisdom,

original: bcom ldan ye shes gzugs can dang // ngag gi dbang phyug gnon pa che //
analyzed: bcom ldan ye shes gzugs can dang // ngag gi dbang phyug gnon pa che //
translated: the lord of speech, the great trampler,🔽all phenomena with the characteristic of space,

original: chos kun nam mkha'i mtshan nyid dang // dri med yongs su dag pa rnams //
analyzed: chos kun nam mkha'i mtshan nyid dang // dri med yongs su dag pa rnams //
translated: and the stainless, completely pure ones,

original: shar lho nas mtshams rim bzhin dgod //
analyzed: shar lho nas mtshams rim bzhin dgod //
translated: are arranged in the southeast and so on, in order.

original: rtsibs kyi mu khyud 'khor bar ni //
analyzed: rtsibs kyi mu khyud 'khor bar ni //
translated: On the periphery of the spokes,

original: sarba dharm'a: zhes pa nas //
analyzed: sarba dharm'a: zhes pa nas //
translated: from sarva dharma,🔽up to tathagata,

original: ta th'a ga ta'i bar du dgod //
analyzed: ta th'a ga ta'i bar du dgod //
translated: are arranged.

original: de ltar thabs dang shes rab kyi //
analyzed: de ltar thabs dang shes rab kyi //
translated: In that way, method and wisdom

original: 'khor lo gnyis ni gsal bltas nas //
analyzed: 'khor lo gnyis ni gsal bltas nas //
translated: Having visualized the two wheels,

original: yi ge 'od zer spro bsdu las //
analyzed: yi ge 'od zer spro bsdu las //
translated: from the light rays emanating and reabsorbing the syllables,

original: sdang sems nang du chud par ni //
analyzed: sdang sems nang du chud par ni //
translated: the mind of hatred is brought inside.

original: brtan pa'i sems kyis bsgom par bya //
analyzed: brtan pa'i sems kyis bsgom par bya //
translated: One should meditate with a stable mind.

original: de yis chos rnams thams cad ni //
analyzed: de yis chos rnams thams cad ni //
translated: By that, all phenomena

original: gnyis med ye shes bde ba che //
analyzed: gnyis med ye shes bde ba che //
translated: are the great bliss of nondual wisdom,

original: 'od gsal bar du gsal bar 'gyur //
analyzed: 'od gsal bar du gsal bar 'gyur //
translated: clearly manifest in the clear light.

original: zhes bya ba ni sgom pa yongs su rdzogs pa'i mtshan nyid de yid skyo bar ma gyur pa de srid du bsgom par bya'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni sgom pa yongs su rdzogs pa'i mtshan nyid de yid skyo bar ma gyur pa de srid du bsgom par bya'o //
translated: This is the characteristic of the perfection of meditation. One should meditate for as long as one’s mind does not become weary.

original: yid skyo bar gyur na thabs dang shes rab kyi sngags mdo las gsungs pa bzhin du 'khor lo'i tshul gyis 'bru drug la sogs pa bzla bar bya'o //
analyzed: yid skyo bar gyur na thabs dang shes rab kyi sngags mdo las gsungs pa bzhin du 'khor lo'i tshul gyis 'bru drug la sogs pa bzla bar bya'o //
translated: When the mind becomes weary, one should recite the six syllables, and so on, according to the method of the wheel, as taught in the sutras of method and wisdom.

original: de nas skye ba de yang bdag dang sems can thams cad dang thun mong ba bya'o //
analyzed: de nas skye ba de yang bdag dang sems can thams cad dang thun mong ba bya'o //
translated: Then, that merit should be dedicated to oneself and all sentient beings.

original: bla na med pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo bar bya'o //
analyzed: bla na med pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo bar bya'o //
translated: It should be dedicated to unsurpassed awakening.

original: 'jam dpal ye shes sems dpa' yongs su grub pa nyid gshegs su gsol ba ni /
analyzed: 'jam dpal ye shes sems dpa' yongs su grub pa nyid gshegs su gsol ba ni /
translated: The request for the departure of the perfect Mañjuvajrasattva is as follows:

original: bde bar gshegs so bcom ldan 'das //
analyzed: bde bar gshegs so bcom ldan 'das //
translated: You have gone to bliss, O Blessed One.

original: khyod kyis sems can don kun mdzad //
analyzed: khyod kyis sems can don kun mdzad //
translated: You have done all that must be done for the sake of sentient beings.

original: dngos grub tshul bzhin stsal lags kyis //
analyzed: dngos grub tshul bzhin stsal lags kyis //
translated: You have granted spiritual powers in accordance with the rules.

original: sangs rgyas yul du gshegs nas kyang //
analyzed: sangs rgyas yul du gshegs nas kyang //
translated: Having gone to the land of the buddhas,

original: slar yang 'byon par mdzad du gsol //
analyzed: slar yang 'byon par mdzad du gsol //
translated: please return again.

original: zhes pas gshegs su gsol ba'o //
analyzed: zhes pas gshegs su gsol ba'o //
translated: With this verse, request them to depart.

original: 'khor lo yi ge dang bcas pa rnams sdud pa'i tshul gyis bdag nyid la bstims nas /
analyzed: 'khor lo yi ge dang bcas pa rnams sdud pa'i tshul gyis bdag nyid la bstims nas /
translated: The wheels together with the letters dissolve into you in the manner of being absorbed.

original: spyod lam thams cad 'jam dpal ye shes sems dpa'i ngo bos gnas par bya'o //
analyzed: spyod lam thams cad 'jam dpal ye shes sems dpa'i ngo bos gnas par bya'o //
translated: You should remain in all your activities with the identity of Mañjuśrījñānasattva.

original: de ltar rgyun du bsgoms pa'i phan yon ni phan yon bstan pa'i mdo las /
analyzed: de ltar rgyun du bsgoms pa'i phan yon ni phan yon bstan pa'i mdo las /
translated: The benefits of meditating in this way continuously are taught in the Sūtra Revealing the Benefits:

original: lag na rdo rje 'chang chen zhes bya ba nas /
analyzed: lag na rdo rje 'chang chen zhes bya ba nas /
translated: “Mahāvajrapāṇi” and so forth,

original: phyogs bcur dam pa chos kyi sku sgra chen po rgyun mi 'chad pa sgrogs pa'i chos kyi rgyal po chen por 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i bar du phan yon ma lus par bstan pa go bar @241b bya'o ;
analyzed: phyogs bcur dam pa chos kyi sku sgra chen po rgyun mi 'chad pa sgrogs pa'i chos kyi rgyal po chen por 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i bar du phan yon ma lus par bstan pa go bar @241b bya'o ;
translated: up to “you will become a great Dharma king who proclaims the great sound of the Dharma body of the sublime Dharma uninterruptedly in the ten directions.”

original: / da ni 'jam dpal ye shes sems dpa'/
analyzed: / da ni 'jam dpal ye shes sems dpa'/
translated: Now, in order to teach the wisdom being Mañjuśrī,🔽and the great family of all secret mantras,

original: gsang sngags rigs chen thams cad dang // zhes bya ba bstan pa'i phyir /
analyzed: gsang sngags rigs chen thams cad dang // zhes bya ba bstan pa'i phyir /
translated: it is said:

original: 'di ltar sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das //
analyzed: 'di ltar sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das //
translated: Thus, the blessed buddhas

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: and so forth.

original: 'di ltar zhes pa ni dmigs pa nye bar ston pa'i tshig go //
analyzed: 'di ltar zhes pa ni dmigs pa nye bar ston pa'i tshig go //
translated: Thus indicates the proximity of the object to be taught.

original: rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas aa las byung //
analyzed: rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas aa las byung //
translated: The perfect buddhas arise from A.

original: zhes pa la yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das aa las skyes zhes bya ba nyid de /
analyzed: zhes pa la yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das aa las skyes zhes bya ba nyid de /
translated: Here, the blessed perfect buddhas are said to be born from A.

original: de la aa ni yi ge ste rnam par dbye ba zhes bya ste /
analyzed: de la aa ni yi ge ste rnam par dbye ba zhes bya ste /
translated: There, A is a syllable, called discriminated,

original: bye brag mang po'i tshul gyis mnos zhes bya ba nyid do //
analyzed: bye brag mang po'i tshul gyis mnos zhes bya ba nyid do //
translated: meaning grasped in the manner of many distinctions.

original: chen po nyid kyang chos thams cad kyi rtsa bar gyur pa yin zhing /
analyzed: chen po nyid kyang chos thams cad kyi rtsa bar gyur pa yin zhing /
translated: Greatness itself is the root of all dharmas,

original: rgyu'i tshul gyis ma lus par bstan to //
analyzed: rgyu'i tshul gyis ma lus par bstan to //
translated: and is taught in its entirety by way of cause.

original: gsang sngags rig sngags 'chang ba'i rigs //
analyzed: gsang sngags rig sngags 'chang ba'i rigs //
translated: The family of the holders of secret mantras and knowledge mantras,

original: zhes bya ba ni bde ba chen po nye bar mtshon pa nyid rigs las skyes pa'i phyir rig sngags te /
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni bde ba chen po nye bar mtshon pa nyid rigs las skyes pa'i phyir rig sngags te /
translated: This is the knowledge-mantra, since it is born from the family of the great bliss itself.

original: 'dzin pa la brtsams par 'chang ba dang / bgrang ba nye bar mtshon pa'i phyir na rigs zhes bya'o //
analyzed: 'dzin pa la brtsams par 'chang ba dang / bgrang ba nye bar mtshon pa'i phyir na rigs zhes bya'o //
translated: The family is called the family since it is the support and the counting of the great bliss.

original: de nyid lam gyi mtshan nyid sems dpa' gsum gyi bdag nyid bsgrub pas na /
analyzed: de nyid lam gyi mtshan nyid sems dpa' gsum gyi bdag nyid bsgrub pas na /
translated: Since it is the accomplishment of the nature of the three beings, which is the characteristic of the path,

original: rigs gsum la ni rnam par gzigs //
analyzed: rigs gsum la ni rnam par gzigs //
translated: it is the seer of the three families.

original: zhes pa ste blta ba ni yid kyis nges par blta'o zhes bya bar dgongs so //
analyzed: zhes pa ste blta ba ni yid kyis nges par blta'o zhes bya bar dgongs so //
translated: The seeing is the mental seeing, this is the thought.

original: sems dpa' gsum gyi las 'bras bu rnams gnyis 'byung bar bstan pa ni /
analyzed: sems dpa' gsum gyi las 'bras bu rnams gnyis 'byung bar bstan pa ni /
translated: The result of the action of the three beings is taught to be the arising of the two:

original: 'jig rten 'jig rten 'das pa'i rigs //🔽zhes gsungs te /
analyzed: 'jig rten 'jig rten 'das pa'i rigs // zhes gsungs te /
translated: the mundane and supramundane families.

original: tshangs pa la sogs pa'i 'jig rten pa'i dngos grub po zhes te /
analyzed: tshangs pa la sogs pa'i 'jig rten pa'i dngos grub po zhes te /
translated: The mundane siddhis are the siddhis of Brahma and so on.

original: de yang rnam pa mang po dang ldan par rigs zhes bya'o //
analyzed: de yang rnam pa mang po dang ldan par rigs zhes bya'o //
translated: And that is called the family since it has many aspects.

original: 'jig rten 'das pa'i rigs gang zhe na snyam pa la /
analyzed: 'jig rten 'das pa'i rigs gang zhe na snyam pa la /
translated: What is the supramundane family?

original: 'jig rten snang byed rigs chen dang // zhes gsungs te /
analyzed: 'jig rten snang byed rigs chen dang // zhes gsungs te /
translated: The great family of the Illuminator of the World,

original: 'jig rten ni 'jig rten pa'i mtshan nyid yin la /
analyzed: 'jig rten ni 'jig rten pa'i mtshan nyid yin la /
translated: The Illuminator of the World is the characteristic of the world.

original: bde ba chen po'i tshul gyis na snang bar byed pa zhes bya ba dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi gong na de las gzhan med pas na chen po zhes bya ste de nyid chos kyi sku'o //
analyzed: bde ba chen po'i tshul gyis na snang bar byed pa zhes bya ba dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi gong na de las gzhan med pas na chen po zhes bya ste de nyid chos kyi sku'o //
translated: It is called the Illuminator because it is the method of great bliss, and it is called the Great because there is nothing higher than all the Buddhas.🔽The supreme family of the Great Seal,

original: phyag rgya chen po'i rigs mchog dang // zhes pa ni mtshan dang dpe byad kyis brgyan pas bcu pa'i ston pa sku phyag rgya chen po'i tshul gyis bzhugs shing /
analyzed: phyag rgya chen po'i rigs mchog dang // zhes pa ni mtshan dang dpe byad kyis brgyan pas bcu pa'i ston pa sku phyag rgya chen po'i tshul gyis bzhugs shing /
translated: The Great Seal is the teacher of the tenth stage, who resides in the method of the Great Seal, adorned with the major and minor marks.

original: zhing khyad par can gyi bdag po mchog ces bya ste de nyid longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku'o //
analyzed: zhing khyad par can gyi bdag po mchog ces bya ste de nyid longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku'o //
translated: It is called the supreme lord of the special field.

original: rin chen gtsug tor cher gtsigs nas //
analyzed: rin chen gtsug tor cher gtsigs nas //
translated: The great jewel crest,

original: zhes pa ni sprul pa'i sku ste /🔽mdzad pa khyad @242a * //
analyzed: zhes pa ni sprul pa'i sku ste / mdzad pa khyad @242a * //
translated: The emanation body.

original: par can dang ldan pas na chen po zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: par can dang ldan pas na chen po zhes bya ba ste /
translated: It is called the Great because it has special deeds.

original: 'jig rten pa thams cad kyi gtsug gi nor bur gyur pas na gtsug tor zhes bya ste /
analyzed: 'jig rten pa thams cad kyi gtsug gi nor bur gyur pas na gtsug tor zhes bya ste /
translated: Since it is the crest jewel of all mundane beings, it is called the crest.

original: gzigs pa ni de lta bu'i tshul gyis thugs la bzhag pa yin te /
analyzed: gzigs pa ni de lta bu'i tshul gyis thugs la bzhag pa yin te /
translated: The vision is the placement in the mind of such a method.

original: dgos pa'i khyad par yin pa ni 'jig rten na de la bltas nas de bya zhes zer ba de lta bu'o //
analyzed: dgos pa'i khyad par yin pa ni 'jig rten na de la bltas nas de bya zhes zer ba de lta bu'o //
translated: The special purpose is that in the world, it is said, “Having seen that, do this.”

original: de lta bu'i don dag ji lta bu gsungs she na /
analyzed: de lta bu'i don dag ji lta bu gsungs she na /
translated: How are such meanings taught?

original: tshig gi bdag pos tshigs su bcad //
analyzed: tshig gi bdag pos tshigs su bcad //
translated: The lord of words spoke in verse.

original: ces pa ni gsum pa'i don la dang po'i tshig ste /
analyzed: ces pa ni gsum pa'i don la dang po'i tshig ste /
translated: This is the word of the first in the meaning of the third.

original: tshigs su bcad pas gsungs so zhes bya ba nyid do //
analyzed: tshigs su bcad pas gsungs so zhes bya ba nyid do //
translated: It is just that he spoke in verse.

original: gsang sngags rgyal po drug ldan zhing //
analyzed: gsang sngags rgyal po drug ldan zhing //
translated: Endowed with the six kings of mantra

original: zhes pa ni dngos po kun gyi rigs drug dang zhar las byung ba'i 'jig rten pa'i rigs gsal ba'i rgyu 'bras kyi rigs drug ste /
analyzed: zhes pa ni dngos po kun gyi rigs drug dang zhar las byung ba'i 'jig rten pa'i rigs gsal ba'i rgyu 'bras kyi rigs drug ste /
translated: is the cause and result of the six families of all things and the six families of the clarifying cause and result of the mundane families that arise incidentally.

original: de nyid gsang sngags kyi tshul du gsungs pa dang / rig pa kun gyi rgyal po ni gsang sngags rgyal po zhes bya'o //
analyzed: de nyid gsang sngags kyi tshul du gsungs pa dang / rig pa kun gyi rgyal po ni gsang sngags rgyal po zhes bya'o //
translated: That itself is taught in the manner of mantra, and the king of all awareness is called the king of mantra.

original: de dag rigs nges pa nyid ma yin zhing rigs gcig par bsnyen pa ni //
analyzed: de dag rigs nges pa nyid ma yin zhing rigs gcig par bsnyen pa ni //
translated: They are not definitely of one type, but are of one type in being cultivated.🔽They arise as nondual.

original: gnyis su med par 'byung ba dang // zhes gsungs te rigs thams cad bde ba chen po'i tshul gyis zhes bya bar dgongs so //
analyzed: gnyis su med par 'byung ba dang // zhes gsungs te rigs thams cad bde ba chen po'i tshul gyis zhes bya bar dgongs so //
translated: It is intended that all types are in the manner of great bliss.

original: mi skye chos can 'di gsungs pa //
analyzed: mi skye chos can 'di gsungs pa //
translated: This is said to be the nonarising of phenomena.

original: zhes pa ste bdun pa dang byed pa 'dom pa'i tshig ste /
analyzed: zhes pa ste bdun pa dang byed pa 'dom pa'i tshig ste /
translated: This is the seventh verse, which measures the action.

original: chos thams cad skye ba med pa las skye bar gsungs pa dang / rnam par rtog ba'i chos mi skye bar byed pa'i chos gsungs zhes pa ste /
analyzed: chos thams cad skye ba med pa las skye bar gsungs pa dang / rnam par rtog ba'i chos mi skye bar byed pa'i chos gsungs zhes pa ste /
translated: It is said that all phenomena arise from nonarising, and the phenomena that cause conceptualization are said to be nonarising.

original: ldan pa ni sngags kyi tshig 'di nyid la ldan par bstan pa de nyid yin la /
analyzed: ldan pa ni sngags kyi tshig 'di nyid la ldan par bstan pa de nyid yin la /
translated: The possession is taught to be possessed in this very mantra.

original: de dag gis ni 'brel pa gsum gyi bdag nyid nges par bstan pa rdzogs so /
analyzed: de dag gis ni 'brel pa gsum gyi bdag nyid nges par bstan pa rdzogs so /
translated: That completes the teaching of the nature of the three relationships.

original: // / da ni chos thams cad skye ba med pa las skye bar gsungs pa dang / rnam par rtog pa'i tshogs thams cad mi skye bar gsungs pa ni /
analyzed: // / da ni chos thams cad skye ba med pa las skye bar gsungs pa dang / rnam par rtog pa'i tshogs thams cad mi skye bar gsungs pa ni /
translated: Now, the teaching that all phenomena arise from nonarising and the teaching that all hosts of conceptualization are nonarising are as follows.

original: aa a'a ai a'i zhes pa nas ya te na ma: zhes bya ba'i bar du yi ge drug cu rtsa bzhi rnams te /
analyzed: aa a'a ai a'i zhes pa nas ya te na ma: zhes bya ba'i bar du yi ge drug cu rtsa bzhi rnams te /
translated: The sixty-four syllables are from “a a ā a i ī ai a u ū au a e ai aṃ aḥ” up to “ya ra la va śa ṣa sa ha kṣa.”

original: 'di ni chos thams cad kyi rtsa bar gyur pa thabs dang shes rab gnyis su med pa'i 'jam dpal ye shes sems dpa' bsgom par bya ba yin la /
analyzed: 'di ni chos thams cad kyi rtsa bar gyur pa thabs dang shes rab gnyis su med pa'i 'jam dpal ye shes sems dpa' bsgom par bya ba yin la /
translated: This is the meditation on Mañjuśrī, the wisdom being, who is the root of all dharmas, the nondual method and wisdom.

original: bdag nyid nges par 'byung bar 'dod pa rnams kyis 'di ltar rang bzhin mngon par dga' ba'i gnas su stan bde ba la 'dug nas /
analyzed: bdag nyid nges par 'byung bar 'dod pa rnams kyis 'di ltar rang bzhin mngon par dga' ba'i gnas su stan bde ba la 'dug nas /
translated: Those who wish to attain liberation should sit on a comfortable seat in a place that is naturally pleasant.

original: me tog la sogs pa mchod pa'i yo byad mdun du bshams la /
analyzed: me tog la sogs pa mchod pa'i yo byad mdun du bshams la /
translated: In front of them, they should arrange offerings such as flowers.

original: rang gi snying gar nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng du @242b tha ma'i yi ge bzhag ste /
analyzed: rang gi snying gar nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng du @242b tha ma'i yi ge bzhag ste /
translated: At their heart, they should visualize a sun maṇḍala upon which is the syllable taṃ.

original: de las 'od zer spros pas bcom ldan 'das 'jam dpal ye shes sems dpa' thabs dang shes rab kyi bdag nyid can dang / dus gsum gyi de bzhin gshegs pa rnams mdun gyi nam mkha' la spyan drangs te blta bar bya'o //
analyzed: de las 'od zer spros pas bcom ldan 'das 'jam dpal ye shes sems dpa' thabs dang shes rab kyi bdag nyid can dang / dus gsum gyi de bzhin gshegs pa rnams mdun gyi nam mkha' la spyan drangs te blta bar bya'o //
translated: Light radiates from that syllable, inviting the bhagavān Mañjuśrī, the wisdom being, who is the embodiment of method and wisdom, and the tathāgatas of the three times into the space in front of them.

original: de la bdag gis sarba ta th'a ga ta manydzu shr'i dzny'a na m'urti p'a da banda nam ka ro mi zhes pas phyag bya'o //
analyzed: de la bdag gis sarba ta th'a ga ta manydzu shr'i dzny'a na m'urti p'a da banda nam ka ro mi zhes pas phyag bya'o //
translated: To that [buddha], one should make prostrations with sarvatathāgatamāyajñānamūrtipādavanakaro mi.

original: de'i rjes la phyi dang nang gi mchod pa rnams kyis legs par mchod de /
analyzed: de'i rjes la phyi dang nang gi mchod pa rnams kyis legs par mchod de /
translated: After that, one should make offerings with outer and inner offerings.

original: de'i mdun du sdig pa bshags pa la sogs pa 'di ltar bya ste /🔽bdag gi tshe rabs thog ma ma mchis pa nas /
analyzed: de'i mdun du sdig pa bshags pa la sogs pa 'di ltar bya ste / bdag gi tshe rabs thog ma ma mchis pa nas /
translated: In front of that [buddha], one should confess one's misdeeds and so forth in the following way:

original: da ltar gyi bar du sgo gsum nas sdig pa bgyis pa thams cad bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar so sor bshags so //
analyzed: da ltar gyi bar du sgo gsum nas sdig pa bgyis pa thams cad bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar so sor bshags so //
translated: All the misdeeds I have done with my three doors from beginningless lifetimes up to the present, I confess each and every one of them in the presence of the Bhagavān.

original: phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' dang khams gsum gyi sems can thams cad kyi dge ba la rjes su yi rang ngo //
analyzed: phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' dang khams gsum gyi sems can thams cad kyi dge ba la rjes su yi rang ngo //
translated: I rejoice in the virtues of the buddhas and bodhisattvas of the ten directions and all sentient beings of the three realms.

original: bdag dang de dag gi bgyi ba gcig tu gyur pas bla na med pa'i byang chub yongs su bsngo bar bya'o //
analyzed: bdag dang de dag gi bgyi ba gcig tu gyur pas bla na med pa'i byang chub yongs su bsngo bar bya'o //
translated: May my actions and theirs become one, and I dedicate [the merit] to unsurpassed enlightenment.

original: khams gsum gyi sems can rnams theg pa chen po gsang sngags kyis bla na med pa la nges par gzhag go //
analyzed: khams gsum gyi sems can rnams theg pa chen po gsang sngags kyis bla na med pa la nges par gzhag go //
translated: I will establish all sentient beings of the three realms in the unsurpassed [state] of the secret mantra of the Great Vehicle.

original: bdag gis sems can mngon par rdzogs par byang chub par bya ba'i phyir theg pa chen po bla na med pa'i byang chub chen por sems bskyed do //
analyzed: bdag gis sems can mngon par rdzogs par byang chub par bya ba'i phyir theg pa chen po bla na med pa'i byang chub chen por sems bskyed do //
translated: For the sake of bringing sentient beings to complete and perfect enlightenment, I generate the mind of awakening, the unsurpassed Great Vehicle, the great enlightenment.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang 'jam dpal ye shes sems dpa' la skyabs su mchi'o //
