original: zhes bya ba nyid do //
analyzed: zhes bya ba nyid do //
translated: It is also called the great bliss of the ultimate because it is the great bliss of the ultimate, which is the ultimate of all objects of knowledge.

original: de las gzhan gyi sems rig pa mtha' dag rig par gyur pa'i mngon par shes pa lnga yongs su dag par gyur pa ni 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa dang da ltar byung ba'i dus kyi 'bras bu rtogs par gyur cing de nyid rgyud pa dpag tu med
analyzed: de las gzhan gyi sems rig pa mtha' dag rig par gyur pa'i mngon par shes pa lnga yongs su dag par gyur pa ni 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa dang da ltar byung ba'i dus kyi 'bras bu rtogs par gyur cing de nyid rgyud pa dpag tu med
translated: The five superknowledges, which are the knowledge of the minds of others and the knowledge of all the other superknowledges, are the pure result of the knowledge of the past, future, and present.

original: pa'i tshul gyis na dus med pa zhes bya la de ltar rtogs pa ni /🔽dus gsum du med rtogs pa po //
analyzed: pa'i tshul gyis na dus med pa zhes bya la de ltar rtogs pa ni / dus gsum du med rtogs pa po //
translated: Since that knowledge is infinite in its continuity, it is called “without time.”🔽The realization of that is

original: zhes bya ba nyid do //
analyzed: zhes bya ba nyid do //
translated: the realization of the nonexistence of the three times.

original: sems can kun gyi klu chen po //
analyzed: sems can kun gyi klu chen po //
translated: The great nāga of all sentient beings🔽is the nāga that rains down the gift of the Dharma on all sentient beings of the three realms.

original: zhes pa ni khams gsum gyi sems can thams cad la chos kyi sbyin pa'i char rab tu 'bebs pa ni klu yin la khams gsum pa thams cad du khyab par 'gyur ba ni chen po zhes bya ba nyid do //
analyzed: zhes pa ni khams gsum gyi sems can thams cad la chos kyi sbyin pa'i char rab tu 'bebs pa ni klu yin la khams gsum pa thams cad du khyab par 'gyur ba ni chen po zhes bya ba nyid do //
translated: The great one pervades all three realms.

original: chos kyi nges par legs pa de nyid kyis so so skye bo rnams lhag pa'i tshul khrims dang shes rab la sogs par 'jig rten 'di dang pha rol tu phyin par gyur pa ni /
analyzed: chos kyi nges par legs pa de nyid kyis so so skye bo rnams lhag pa'i tshul khrims dang shes rab la sogs par 'jig rten 'di dang pha rol tu phyin par gyur pa ni /
translated: By that very Dharma of definite goodness, ordinary beings attain the perfection of this world and the next, in terms of superior morality, wisdom, and so forth.

original: yon tan thod can rnams kyi thod //
analyzed: yon tan thod can rnams kyi thod //
translated: It is the crown of those with good qualities.

original: ces bya'o // de nyid kyis nyon mongs pa thams cad las thar pa grol bar mdzad cing stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid la rab tu gnas pa ni /
analyzed: ces bya'o // de nyid kyis nyon mongs pa thams cad las thar pa grol bar mdzad cing stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid la rab tu gnas pa ni /
translated: By that very [Dharma], he liberates from all afflictions and establishes them in the characteristic of emptiness.

original: lus kun las ni rab grol ba //
analyzed: lus kun las ni rab grol ba //
translated: Fully liberated from the body,

original: nam mkha'i mtha' la rab gnas pa //
analyzed: nam mkha'i mtha' la rab gnas pa //
translated: Abiding at the limit of space,

original: zhes bya ba nyid do //
analyzed: zhes bya ba nyid do //
translated: It is just so.

original: de ltar 'bras bu chen po yon tan dang bcas pa dang snod rnam par dag pa zab mo'i tshul du bstan nas /
analyzed: de ltar 'bras bu chen po yon tan dang bcas pa dang snod rnam par dag pa zab mo'i tshul du bstan nas /
translated: Having thus taught the great fruit with its good qualities and the pure vessel in the manner of the profound,

original: de'i don nyid ma 'ongs pa'i sems can rnams 'di lta bu yongs su gzung bar bya'o zhes bstan pa'i phyir na /🔽yid bzhin nor bu chen po 'chang //
analyzed: de'i don nyid ma 'ongs pa'i sems can rnams 'di lta bu yongs su gzung bar bya'o zhes bstan pa'i phyir na / yid bzhin nor bu chen po 'chang //
translated: in order to teach that the meaning of that very [Dharma] should be taken up by future sentient beings,

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
translated: [the text says,] Upholding the great wish-fulfilling gem, and so forth.

original: sems can thams cad sangs rgyas kyi yon tan thams cad kyi rtsa bar gyur pa ni byang chub sems yin te /
analyzed: sems can thams cad sangs rgyas kyi yon tan thams cad kyi rtsa bar gyur pa ni byang chub sems yin te /
translated: The root of all the good qualities of the buddhas is the thought of awakening of all sentient beings.

original: de bskyed pa ni yid bzhin nor bu ltar dgos pa thams cad grub par byed pa gang yin pa de la de skad ces bya zhing //
analyzed: de bskyed pa ni yid bzhin nor bu ltar dgos pa thams cad grub par byed pa gang yin pa de la de skad ces bya zhing //
translated: The generation of that thought is called “the thought of awakening” because it accomplishes all needs like a wish-fulfilling gem.

original: de nyid theg pa chen por sems bskyed pa yin la /
analyzed: de nyid theg pa chen por sems bskyed pa yin la /
translated: That itself is the generation of the thought of awakening in the Great Vehicle.

original: de las khyad par du theg pa chen po'i gsang sngags su sems bskyed pa ni /🔽khyab bdag rin chen kun gyi mchog / ces bya ste de la 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i dngos grub thams cad 'byung bar gyur pa ni /
analyzed: de las khyad par du theg pa chen po'i gsang sngags su sems bskyed pa ni / khyab bdag rin chen kun gyi mchog / ces bya ste de la 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i dngos grub thams cad 'byung bar gyur pa ni /
translated: The generation of the thought of awakening in the Great Vehicle of Secret Mantra is special.

original: dpag bsam shing chen rgyas pa ste //🔽zhes bya ba nyid do //
analyzed: dpag bsam shing chen rgyas pa ste // zhes bya ba nyid do //
translated: The source of all mundane and supramundane powers is the great wish-fulfilling tree.

original: de'i rjes la ngag dang yid kyi rten du gyur pa lus rnam par dag par byed pa bum pa'i dbang bstan pa ni /
analyzed: de'i rjes la ngag dang yid kyi rten du gyur pa lus rnam par dag par byed pa bum pa'i dbang bstan pa ni /
translated: After that, the vase empowerment, which purifies the body, which is the support of speech and mind, is taught.

original: bum pa bzang po che ba'i mchog / ces gsungs @256b te ;
analyzed: bum pa bzang po che ba'i mchog / ces gsungs @256b te ;
translated: The excellent vase is the supreme greatness.

original: de la bum pa ni lus kyi dri ma dang rtog pa'i tshogs mtha' dag zhi bar byed pa yin la /
analyzed: de la bum pa ni lus kyi dri ma dang rtog pa'i tshogs mtha' dag zhi bar byed pa yin la /
translated: The vase is that which pacifies all the body's impurities and the host of thoughts.

original: 'jig rten pa'i dbang phyug chen po la sogs pa'i srid srung gi bu zhes khyad par du gyur pa gang yin pa de la de skad ces bya zhing /
analyzed: 'jig rten pa'i dbang phyug chen po la sogs pa'i srid srung gi bu zhes khyad par du gyur pa gang yin pa de la de skad ces bya zhing /
translated: It is called the son of the protector of existence because it is the special one among the worldly mahasiddhas, such as Mahesvara, and so on.

original: de nyid kyi sdug bsngal nges par 'jil ba dang / 'bras bu yongs su grub pa'i don byed pas na /
analyzed: de nyid kyi sdug bsngal nges par 'jil ba dang / 'bras bu yongs su grub pa'i don byed pas na /
translated: Since it is the one that definitely dispels the suffering of just that and performs the function of accomplishing the result,

original: byed pa sems can don byed pa //
analyzed: byed pa sems can don byed pa //
translated: it is the agent that performs the benefit of sentient beings.

original: zhes bya'o // de lta bu'i don byed pa'i tshul ni bde ba dang ldan par phan 'dogs pa dang / srid pa'i 'jigs pa rnam pa sna tshogs rnams skyob pa'i grogs su gyur pas na /
analyzed: zhes bya'o // de lta bu'i don byed pa'i tshul ni bde ba dang ldan par phan 'dogs pa dang / srid pa'i 'jigs pa rnam pa sna tshogs rnams skyob pa'i grogs su gyur pas na /
translated: The way of performing that kind of benefit is to assist by connecting with bliss and to be the friend who protects from the various fears of existence.

original: phan 'dogs sems can mnyes gshin pa //
analyzed: phan 'dogs sems can mnyes gshin pa //
translated: Therefore, it is the benefactor who is kind to sentient beings.

analyzed: bkur sti rim sgro phun sum tshogs //

original: zhes bya zhing /

translated: Thus, from the attainment of the perfection of the assembly of offerings, the self is endowed with nonconceptual joy, and since one becomes the great lord of the three times, one is famous everywhere and endowed with the perfection of one's purpose.

original: / bdag nyid la thar pa chen po'i rgyu rab tu ston par byed pa ni sbyin pa rnams kyi nang nas mchog gam gtso bo zhes bya ste /

original: de'i phyir na /

analyzed: mchog ldan mchog sbyin gtso bo ste //

translated: The best of refuges is that very supreme initiation lineage, which is the best of all refuges, such as the inferior, human lord, and so on, and which is not sullied by the conditions of harm to any of those who have gone for refuge. Since one becomes endowed with a great collection of qualities from that,

analyzed: skyabs kyi dam pa skyabs su 'os //🔽zhes bya ba nyid do //

translated: That very highest refuge is the enemy of the great fear of the object of conceptual thought, which is like the poison of the makara's fangs in the ocean of cyclic existence.🔽He is the one who definitely destroys that.

original: de nyid skyed du med pa gtso bor gyur pa dang phyi dang nang gi 'jigs pa'i tshogs dpag tu med pa thams cad sel bar mdzad pa las skyabs /
analyzed: de nyid skyed du med pa gtso bor gyur pa dang phyi dang nang gi 'jigs pa'i tshogs dpag tu med pa thams cad sel bar mdzad pa las skyabs /
translated: He is the one who is the chief of the unborn, and he is the refuge from the entire mass of immeasurable outer and inner fears.

analyzed: 'jig rten dgra ste rab kyi mchog /'jigs pa ma lus sel ba po // zhes @257b bya'o //

original: gtsug phud phud bu lcang lo can //

analyzed: zhes bya ba la de la gtsug phung ni 'dzag pa nye bar bsten pa zhes brjod de /

analyzed: 'khor ba'i bdag nyid du yang nas yang du skye bar 'gyur ba ni 'dzag pa zhes bya ba la /

original: de nyid thar pa chen po'i grong khyer gyi skyo bar byed pa dang / rnam par snang mdzad de rab kyi bdag nyid gtso bor gyur pa'i gnas dpral ba ru rab tu bzhag pa dang / de la yon tan gyi tshogs bskyed par gyur pa gang yin pa de la de skad ces bya zhing /

translated: He is called that because he generates the assembly of qualities.

original: ral pa munydza cod pa na thogs //
analyzed: ral pa munydza cod pa na thogs //

original: zhes pa ni drug pa'i don la dang po'i tshig ste /
analyzed: zhes pa ni drug pa'i don la dang po'i tshig ste /

analyzed: ral ba'i munydza zhes bya ba nyid yin la ral pa'i sgras ni bems por brjod la /
translated: The word matted hair is itself called munja. The word matted hair expresses the meaning of being inanimate.

original: bems po rtog pa dang bral ba'i don gyis sangs rgyas nges par 'byin pa mang po yang nas yang du mdud cing brtsegs pa gus pa'i tshul gyis spyi bos mchog tu 'dud par byed pa gang yin pa de la de skad ces bya'o //

translated: The one who repeatedly and respectfully bows his head to the many buddhas, the liberators, who are knotted and piled up in the manner of respect, is called that because he is free from conceptualization, the meaning of being inanimate.

original: de nyid sku lnga dang ye shes lnga dang 'byung ba lnga dang bdag nyid ldog pa'i bye brag gi 'bras bu'i chos rgyu la tshang bar bstan pa ni /🔽gdong lnga gtsug phud lnga dang ldan //
analyzed: de nyid sku lnga dang ye shes lnga dang 'byung ba lnga dang bdag nyid ldog pa'i bye brag gi 'bras bu'i chos rgyu la tshang bar bstan pa ni / gdong lnga gtsug phud lnga dang ldan //
translated: The result is the five kayas, the five pristine consciousnesses, the five elements, and the individual aspects of the nature.🔽The five faces and the five topknots

original: zur phud lnga ba me tog thod //
analyzed: zur phud lnga ba me tog thod //
translated: are the five locks of hair and the flower skull.

original: ces gsungs te de la gdong ldan ni rtsa bar gyur pa ye shes kyi bdag nyid dang gtsug phud ni gtso bo'i tshul rigs kyi bdag po ste /🔽zur phud ni 'khor du gnas pa'i tshul gyis 'byung ba ste de dag ni 'byung ba chu'i khams dang / rigs kyi bdag po mi bskyod pa dang / me long lta bu'i ye shes zhes bya ba nas me ni 'byung ba nam mkha'i khams dang rigs kyi bdag po rnam par snang mdzad dang /

translated: The five faces are the nature of the pristine consciousness that is the root. The topknot is the nature of the principal one, the lord of the family.🔽The locks of hair are the nature of the retinue.

original: chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes pa'i bar du go bar bya zhing slob dpon dang sna tshogs pa la yang de bzhin du go bar bya'o //
analyzed: chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes pa'i bar du go bar bya zhing slob dpon dang sna tshogs pa la yang de bzhin du go bar bya'o //
translated: One should understand this up to the gnosis of the dharmadhātu.

original: me tog thong ni me tog gi phreng ba'i thod ces bya'o //
analyzed: me tog thong ni me tog gi phreng ba'i thod ces bya'o //
translated: The flower garland is the flower garland crest.🔽The crown is the nature of Vajrasattva.

original: spyi bor yongs su 'dzin pa rdo rje sems dpa'i ngo bo zhes bya bar dgongs so //
analyzed: spyi bor yongs su 'dzin pa rdo rje sems dpa'i ngo bo zhes bya bar dgongs so //
translated: This is the intention.🔽That itself is superior to the observances of the tīrthikas and so on, and it purifies the entire mass of conceptuality.🔽It is not the case that it is the birthplace of the pure conduct of the śrāvakas and so on, and it is free from proliferation.

original: de nyid mu stegs la sogs pa'i brtul zhugs las khyad par du gyur cing rnam par rtog pa'i tshogs mtha' dag 'byang bar gyur pa dang / nyan thos la sogs pa'i tshangs par spyod pa'i skye gnas su song ba ma yin zhing spros pa dang bral ba ni rdul gyis ma gos shing nyes pa'i skyon mtha' dag las dag par gyur pas na /

translated: Since it is unstained by dust and pure of all faults,

original: mgo zlum brtul zhugs chen po pa //
analyzed: mgo zlum brtul zhugs chen po pa //
translated: it is the great observance of the shaved head.

translated: The cessation of the faults of desire and so on is not austerity, but the precious mind of enlightenment is.🔽The cessation of all the hosts of faults is the great sage.

original: rtog pa'i tshogs mtha' dgag pa ni thub pa chen po ste de'i phyir na /🔽dka' thub mthar phyin dka' thub che //
analyzed: rtog pa'i tshogs mtha' dgag pa ni thub pa chen po ste de'i phyir na / dka' thub mthar phyin dka' thub che //
translated: Therefore,

original: zhes bya ba nyid do //
analyzed: zhes bya ba nyid do //
translated: he is the one who has perfected austerity, the great austerity.

original: gtsang gnas dam pa goo ta ma //
analyzed: gtsang gnas dam pa goo ta ma //
translated: The pure abode, the holy Gautama

original: zhes pa ni de ltar nyes pa'i tshogs mtha' dag dang bral zhing bsod nams kyi tshogs kyi gnas su 'gyur ba dang 'gro ba mtha' dag gi dam par gyur pa gang yin pa de la de skad ces bya zhing /

translated: is free from all the hosts of faults and is the abode of the accumulation of merit. He is the holy one of all migrating beings.

analyzed: de nyid 'jig rten pa'i kha na ma tho ba thams cad spong bar gyur pa'i tshul gyis /
translated: He is the one who has abandoned all mundane faults.

original: bram ze tshangs pa tshangs pa shes //
analyzed: bram ze tshangs pa tshangs pa shes //
translated: He is the Brahman, the pure one, the knower of Brahman.

original: zhes bya la mi gnas pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa nyid tshangs pa chen po thob pas na /
analyzed: zhes bya la mi gnas pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa nyid tshangs pa chen po thob pas na /
translated: he attains nirvana and Brahma.🔽The body of liberation, liberation, and complete liberation🔽.🔽Liberation is liberation from the suffering of the lower realms. Liberation is the characteristic of the higher realms.

translated: Thus, that very vajra is the best of all expressions, and is like the king of speech among all the members of the retinue, and is the source of all good words.

analyzed: zhes pa ni mkhris pa dang bad kan dang 'dus pa la sogs pa'i nad rnams la sman ni chu dang ljon shing la sogs so so yin la /
translated: The medicines for the illnesses of bile, phlegm, and their combination are individual trees and so forth.

original: de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'i bde ba chen pos kyang 'dod chags dang zhe sdang dang gti mug la sogs pa'i nyon mongs pa'i nad rnam pa sna tshogs pa rnams zhi bar byed pa gang yin pa de la skad ces bya zhing /
analyzed: de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'i bde ba chen pos kyang 'dod chags dang zhe sdang dang gti mug la sogs pa'i nyon mongs pa'i nad rnam pa sna tshogs pa rnams zhi bar byed pa gang yin pa de la skad ces bya zhing /
translated: Likewise, the great bliss of the Tathagata is the one who pacifies the various sicknesses of afflictions such as desire, anger, and ignorance.

original: de nyid rnam par rtog pas ma bskyed pa'i nad thams cad dgrar gyur pas /
analyzed: de nyid rnam par rtog pas ma bskyed pa'i nad thams cad dgrar gyur pas /
translated: Since all sicknesses are enemies that are not produced by conceptualization,

original: nad do cog gi dgra che ba /
analyzed: nad do cog gi dgra che ba /
translated: he is the great enemy of all sicknesses.

original: zhes bya'o // 'dod pa dang gzugs dang gzugs med pa'i khams thams cad sngags pa chen po mchog tu gyur pas ni /
analyzed: zhes bya'o // 'dod pa dang gzugs dang gzugs med pa'i khams thams cad sngags pa chen po mchog tu gyur pas ni /
translated: Since he is the supreme great mantra of all the desire, form, and formless realms,

original: sdu gu 'jig rten gsum gyi mchog / ces bya'o //
analyzed: sdu gu 'jig rten gsum gyi mchog / ces bya'o //
translated: he is the handsome one, the supreme of the three worlds.

original: khams gsum pa thams cad kyi sgrol ba'i gtso bor gyur pa dang / de'i dkyil 'khor gyi lha dang lha mo'i tshogs dang stong pa nyid dang snying rje dbyer med pas 'gro ba rnams sgrol bar mdzad pa ni /
analyzed: khams gsum pa thams cad kyi sgrol ba'i gtso bor gyur pa dang / de'i dkyil 'khor gyi lha dang lha mo'i tshogs dang stong pa nyid dang snying rje dbyer med pas 'gro ba rnams sgrol bar mdzad pa ni /
translated: Since he is the chief liberator of all the three realms, and since he liberates migrating beings through the assembly of the deities and goddesses of his mandala, who are inseparable emptiness and compassion,

original: dpal ldan rgyu skar dkyil 'khor can //
analyzed: dpal ldan rgyu skar dkyil 'khor can //
translated: he is the glorious one with the mandala of the stars.

original: zhes bya la 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' yas mu med pa rnams su nam mkha'i khams dang 'dra bar thugs rjes khyab pa ni /
analyzed: zhes bya la 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' yas mu med pa rnams su nam mkha'i khams dang 'dra bar thugs rjes khyab pa ni /
translated: is indicated by the line:

original: phyogs bcu nam mkha'i mthar thug par //
analyzed: phyogs bcu nam mkha'i mthar thug par //
translated: In the ten directions, to the ends of space,

original: chos kyi rgyal mtshan legs par 'dzugs //
analyzed: chos kyi rgyal mtshan legs par 'dzugs //
translated: the victory banner of the Dharma is raised.

original: zhes bya ba nyid do //
analyzed: zhes bya ba nyid do //
translated: The line:

original: 'gro na gdugs gcig yangs pa ste //
analyzed: 'gro na gdugs gcig yangs pa ste //
translated: In a single day, the vastness of going,

original: zhes bya ba de la nyi ma gcig ni skad cig ma'i bye brag mi shes pa rnams la myur ba'i dpe bstan pa ste /
analyzed: zhes bya ba de la nyi ma gcig ni skad cig ma'i bye brag mi shes pa rnams la myur ba'i dpe bstan pa ste /
translated: indicates that a single day, an example of swiftness for those who do not understand the distinctions of instants,

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs kyi skad cig ma gcig la nam mkha'i mthar thug thams cad bgrod par gyur pa gang yin pa de la de skad ces bya zhing /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs kyi skad cig ma gcig la nam mkha'i mthar thug thams cad bgrod par gyur pa gang yin pa de la de skad ces bya zhing /
translated: is a single instant of the mind of the Tathagata, in which all the ends of space are traversed.

original: de nyid byams pa dang thugs rje'i bdag nyid kyis 'gro ba rnams la snying po'i don ston pa ni //
analyzed: de nyid byams pa dang thugs rje'i bdag nyid kyis 'gro ba rnams la snying po'i don ston pa ni //
translated: That very [instant] is the teaching of the meaning of the essence to beings by the nature of love and compassion.🔽The line:

original: byams dang snying rje'i dkyil 'khor can //
analyzed: byams dang snying rje'i dkyil 'khor can //
translated: Endowed with the maṇḍala of love and compassion,

original: zhes bya'o // dpal ldan padma gar gyi bdag / ces bya ba 'dis ni padma'i rigs kyi bdag nyid so sor rtog pa'i ye shes nyid nges par gzung ba nyid do //
analyzed: zhes bya'o // dpal ldan padma gar gyi bdag / ces bya ba 'dis ni padma'i rigs kyi bdag nyid so sor rtog pa'i ye shes nyid nges par gzung ba nyid do //
translated: this shows that the very essence of the lotus lineage is the discerning pristine awareness itself.

original: de la le'u dang po las //
analyzed: de la le'u dang po las //
translated: In the first chapter it says:

original: dpal ldan gsung gi bdag nyid can //
analyzed: dpal ldan gsung gi bdag nyid can //
translated: Glorious lord of speech,

original: dpal ldan gar gyi dbang @260a * //
analyzed: dpal ldan gar gyi dbang @260a * //
translated: glorious lord of the dance,

original: phyug dang // so sor rtog pa'i ye shes te //
analyzed: phyug dang // so sor rtog pa'i ye shes te //
translated: discerning pristine awareness,

original: chags pa chen por rab tu bstan //
analyzed: chags pa chen por rab tu bstan //
translated: is taught to be great passion.

original: zhes gsungs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: zhes gsungs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Thus it is.

original: khyab bdag chen po rin chen gdugs //
analyzed: khyab bdag chen po rin chen gdugs //
translated: Great lord, precious canopy,

original: zhes pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa chen po ni 'gro ba mtha' dag gzung ba dang 'dzin pa'i rnam par rtog pa las skyob par mdzad do //
analyzed: zhes pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa chen po ni 'gro ba mtha' dag gzung ba dang 'dzin pa'i rnam par rtog pa las skyob par mdzad do //
translated: the great transcendent lord protects all transmigrating beings from the concepts of subject and object.

original: de nyid grang ba'i gdung ba dang tsha ba'i gdung ba ltar gnas pas na de las skyob pa gang yin pa de la de skad ces bya zhing /
analyzed: de nyid grang ba'i gdung ba dang tsha ba'i gdung ba ltar gnas pas na de las skyob pa gang yin pa de la de skad ces bya zhing /
translated: Since he abides like a protection from the torment of cold and the torment of heat, he is so called because he protects from those.

original: de la sangs rgyas kyi thugs rje chen po 'byung ba'i chos kyi 'khor los bag chags kyi sa bon thams cad bsregs pa dang / ma rig pa'i mun pa thams cad sel bar byed pas na /
analyzed: de la sangs rgyas kyi thugs rje chen po 'byung ba'i chos kyi 'khor los bag chags kyi sa bon thams cad bsregs pa dang / ma rig pa'i mun pa thams cad sel bar byed pas na /
translated: In this regard, since the wheel of Dharma that arises from the great compassion of the Buddha burns all the seeds of habitual tendencies and dispels all the darkness of ignorance,

original: sangs rgyas kun gyi gzi brjid che ;
analyzed: sangs rgyas kun gyi gzi brjid che ;
translated: it is called the great splendor of all buddhas.

original: / zhes bya zhing dus gsum gyi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad skyed par byed pa'i rten du gyur pas na /🔽sangs rgyas kun gyi sku 'chang ba //
analyzed: / zhes bya zhing dus gsum gyi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad skyed par byed pa'i rten du gyur pas na / sangs rgyas kun gyi sku 'chang ba //
translated: And since it is the support that gives rise to all tathāgatas of the three times,

original: zhes bya'o // sangs rgyas kun gyi rnal 'byor che //
analyzed: zhes bya'o // sangs rgyas kun gyi rnal 'byor che //
translated: it is called the body of all buddhas.

original: zhes pa ni de la rnal 'byor ni chos thams cad rang bzhin thabs dang shes rab gnyis su med pa'i bde ba chen po ste de'i rjes su 'jug pa de la de skad ces bya'o //
analyzed: zhes pa ni de la rnal 'byor ni chos thams cad rang bzhin thabs dang shes rab gnyis su med pa'i bde ba chen po ste de'i rjes su 'jug pa de la de skad ces bya'o //
translated: As for the great yoga of all buddhas, yoga refers to the great bliss of all phenomena as the nondual union of method and wisdom.

original: de nyid dus gsum gyi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad theg pa chen po yongs su rdzogs pa'i chos rigs gcig pa'i skye bo rnams la ston par gyur pa yin pas na /
analyzed: de nyid dus gsum gyi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad theg pa chen po yongs su rdzogs pa'i chos rigs gcig pa'i skye bo rnams la ston par gyur pa yin pas na /
translated: Since it is the teacher of the beings of one spiritual family, who are completely perfected in the Great Vehicle, of all the Tathagatas of the three times,🔽it is the one teaching of all the Buddhas.

original: sangs rgyas kun gyi bstan pa gcig / ces gsungs te de la le'u dang po las //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kun gyi bstan pa gcig / ces gsungs te de la le'u dang po las //
translated: In the first chapter of the Uttaratantra it is said:

original: dus gsum bde gshegs thams cad kyi //
analyzed: dus gsum bde gshegs thams cad kyi //
translated: The one vehicle of all the Sugatas of the three times

original: theg pa gcig tu gyur pa ste //
analyzed: theg pa gcig tu gyur pa ste //
translated: is the one spiritual family of the Buddhas of the three times.

original: gnyis dang gsum du dbyer med cing //
analyzed: gnyis dang gsum du dbyer med cing //
translated: It is indivisible into two or three

original: 'bras bu'i rten la rab tu 'bad //
analyzed: 'bras bu'i rten la rab tu 'bad //
translated: and is the basis of the result.

original: ces gsungs te bstan pa dang theg pa zhes bya ba gcig tu dgongs so //
analyzed: ces gsungs te bstan pa dang theg pa zhes bya ba gcig tu dgongs so //
translated: Thus, the one vehicle and the one teaching are considered to be the same.

original: rdo rje rin chen dbang bskur dpal //
analyzed: rdo rje rin chen dbang bskur dpal //
translated: The glorious bestowal of the vajra jewel

original: zhes pa ni ye shes chen po'i mtshan nyid gsal bar mdzad pa ni bdud kyi tshogs mtha' dag 'joms pa dang 'dod pa'i dngos grub thams cad sgrub pa dang / bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs yongs su rdzogs pa'i phyir na de skad ces bya zhing /
analyzed: zhes pa ni ye shes chen po'i mtshan nyid gsal bar mdzad pa ni bdud kyi tshogs mtha' dag 'joms pa dang 'dod pa'i dngos grub thams cad sgrub pa dang / bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs yongs su rdzogs pa'i phyir na de skad ces bya zhing /
translated: This is the characteristic of great pristine consciousness.

original: de las sangs rgyas dang chos dang dge 'dun 'byung ba'i bdag por gyur pas na /
analyzed: de las sangs rgyas dang chos dang dge 'dun 'byung ba'i bdag por gyur pas na /
translated: It is called that because it conquers the entire host of māras, accomplishes all desired spiritual powers, and is the lord from whom the buddha, dharma, and saṃgha arise because the accumulations of merit and pristine consciousness are completely perfected.

original: rin chen kun bdag dbang phyug ste //
analyzed: rin chen kun bdag dbang phyug ste //
translated: The lord of all jewels is the lord.

original: zhes bya'o // de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i bdag nyid chen po ni sku dang gsung dang thugs dang ye shes kyi bdag nyid rtags kyi byang chub sems dpa' bstan pa ni /
analyzed: zhes bya'o // de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i bdag nyid chen po ni sku dang gsung dang thugs dang ye shes kyi bdag nyid rtags kyi byang chub sems dpa' bstan pa ni /
translated: Thus, the teaching of the sign bodhisattvas, who are the nature of the body, speech, mind, and pristine consciousness of the great identity of the tathāgatas,

original: 'jig rten dbang phyug kun gyi bdag / ces pa la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: 'jig rten dbang phyug kun gyi bdag / ces pa la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: is the lord of all Avalokiteśvaras, and so on.

original: de la 'jig rten dbang phyug ni spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug yin la /
analyzed: de la 'jig rten dbang phyug ni spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug yin la /
translated: Among them, Avalokiteśvara is Avalokiteśvara.

original: rdo rje 'chang ba kun gyi rje //
analyzed: rdo rje 'chang ba kun gyi rje //
translated: The lord of all vajra holders

original: zhes pa ni 'phags @260b pa phyag na rdo rje yin la 'dir ston pa 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa dang / rdo rje sems dpa' rnams ni rim pa ji lta ba bzhin sku dang gsung dang thugs dang ye shes kyi ngo bo yin te de nyid bstan pa ni /
analyzed: zhes pa ni 'phags @260b pa phyag na rdo rje yin la 'dir ston pa 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa dang / rdo rje sems dpa' rnams ni rim pa ji lta ba bzhin sku dang gsung dang thugs dang ye shes kyi ngo bo yin te de nyid bstan pa ni /
translated: This is the noble Vajrapani. Here, the teacher, the youthful Manjusri, and Vajrasattva are, respectively, the essence of body, speech, mind, and gnosis.

original: sangs rgyas kun gyi thugs che ba //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kun gyi thugs che ba //
translated: The great mind of all the Buddhas

original: zhes gsungs te me long lta bu'i ye shes so //
analyzed: zhes gsungs te me long lta bu'i ye shes so //
translated: is the mirror-like gnosis.

original: sangs rgyas kun gyi thugs la gnas //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kun gyi thugs la gnas //
translated: The abode of the mind of all the Buddhas

original: zhes pa ni ye shes kyi bdag nyid rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor chen po yin la /
analyzed: zhes pa ni ye shes kyi bdag nyid rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor chen po yin la /
translated: is the great mandala of the vajra realm, which is the nature of gnosis.

original: sangs rgyas kun gyi sku che ba //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kun gyi sku che ba //
translated: The great body of all the Buddhas

original: zhes bya ba ni chos dbyings ye shes kyi bdag nyid yin zhing /
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni chos dbyings ye shes kyi bdag nyid yin zhing /
translated: is the nature of the gnosis of the realm of phenomena.

original: sangs rgyas kun gyi gsung yang yin //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kun gyi gsung yang yin //
translated: And the speech of all the Buddhas🔽is the gnosis of sameness.

original: zhes pa ni so sor rtog pa'i ye shes kyi bdag nyid yin par gsungs te mnyam pa nyid dang // bya ba grub dang phrin las kyi bdag nyid ni sku dang gsung dang thugs dang ye shes kyi yon tan dang phrin las yin pa'i phyir gud du mi bgrang ba nyid do //
analyzed: zhes pa ni so sor rtog pa'i ye shes kyi bdag nyid yin par gsungs te mnyam pa nyid dang // bya ba grub dang phrin las kyi bdag nyid ni sku dang gsung dang thugs dang ye shes kyi yon tan dang phrin las yin pa'i phyir gud du mi bgrang ba nyid do //
translated: This is said to be the nature of the wisdom of discernment. The nature of equality, action accomplishment, and activity is not counted separately because it is the qualities of body, speech, mind, and wisdom and the activity.

original: de lta bu'i sku dang gsung dang thugs dang ye shes kyi bdag nyid de dag rnam par dag pa'i gsang ba'i dbang la ltos par bstan pa ni /
analyzed: de lta bu'i sku dang gsung dang thugs dang ye shes kyi bdag nyid de dag rnam par dag pa'i gsang ba'i dbang la ltos par bstan pa ni /
translated: The teaching of the secret empowerment, which is the purification of those bodies, speech, minds, and wisdom natures, is taught by:

original: rdo rje nyi ma bde ba che //
analyzed: rdo rje nyi ma bde ba che //
translated: The vajra sun, great bliss,

original: zhes pa la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: zhes pa la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: and so on.

original: de la rdo rje nyi ma ni shes rab kyi bde ba spros pa dang bral ba 'byung ba rang byung gi me tog ces bya ste thabs kyi bsam pa las byung ba dang / kha dog dmar ba'i phyir na nyi ma zhes bya zhing /
analyzed: de la rdo rje nyi ma ni shes rab kyi bde ba spros pa dang bral ba 'byung ba rang byung gi me tog ces bya ste thabs kyi bsam pa las byung ba dang / kha dog dmar ba'i phyir na nyi ma zhes bya zhing /
translated: Therein, the vajra sun is the bliss of wisdom free from proliferation, called the self-originated flower of the element. Since it arises from the mind of method and is red in color, it is called the sun.

original: rdo rje zla ba dri med 'od //
analyzed: rdo rje zla ba dri med 'od //
translated: The vajra moon, stainless light,

original: ces bya ba ni thabs kyi bde ba chen po rtog pa dang bral ba las byung ba byang chub kyi sems zhes bya ste /
analyzed: ces bya ba ni thabs kyi bde ba chen po rtog pa dang bral ba las byung ba byang chub kyi sems zhes bya ste /
translated: This is called the bodhicitta that arises from the great bliss of the method free from conceptuality.

original: de nyid shes rab kyi bsam pa las byung zhing kha dog dkar po'i zla ba zhes bya ste /
analyzed: de nyid shes rab kyi bsam pa las byung zhing kha dog dkar po'i zla ba zhes bya ste /
translated: That itself arises from the contemplation of wisdom and is called the white moon.

original: de nyid rtog pa'i dri ma dang bral bas dri ma med pa'i 'od dang dri ma med pa'i snang ba zhes bya ba nyid do //
analyzed: de nyid rtog pa'i dri ma dang bral bas dri ma med pa'i 'od dang dri ma med pa'i snang ba zhes bya ba nyid do //
translated: Since that itself is free from the stain of conceptuality, it is called the stainless light and the stainless appearance.

original: de nyid rdo rje slob dpon gyi dga' bral las byung zhing de'i gong na lhan cig skyes pa dang mchog tu dga' ba dang po rnams yod pa'i phyir na /
analyzed: de nyid rdo rje slob dpon gyi dga' bral las byung zhing de'i gong na lhan cig skyes pa dang mchog tu dga' ba dang po rnams yod pa'i phyir na /
translated: That itself arises from the joy of the vajra master and above that are the connate, supreme, and first joys.

original: chags bral la sogs chags pa che //
analyzed: chags bral la sogs chags pa che //
translated: Thus, it is the great passion of the passionless and so on.

original: zhes gsungs la de nyid skad cig ma sna tshogs pa dang / rnam par nye ba dang rnam par smin pa dang mtshan nyid dang bral ba las byung zhing skad cig ma rnams me 'bar ba bzhin du 'dod chags 'bar ba las byung ba'i 'od 'bar ba las byung bas na /🔽kha dog sna tshogs 'bar ba'i 'od //
analyzed: zhes gsungs la de nyid skad cig ma sna tshogs pa dang / rnam par nye ba dang rnam par smin pa dang mtshan nyid dang bral ba las byung zhing skad cig ma rnams me 'bar ba bzhin du 'dod chags 'bar ba las byung ba'i 'od 'bar ba las byung bas na / kha dog sna tshogs 'bar ba'i 'od //
translated: That very [vajra] arises from the various instants, from the near instant, from the fully ripened instant, and from the instant free from characteristics. The instants arise from the blazing of passion, like a blazing fire.🔽Since it arises from the blazing light,

original: ces bya ba nyid do //
analyzed: ces bya ba nyid do //
translated: it is the light of the blazing of various colors.

original: de nyid sbyor ba chen po ji lta bu las byung zhe na /
analyzed: de nyid sbyor ba chen po ji lta bu las byung zhe na /
translated: How does that arise from the great union?

original: rdo rje skyil krung rdzogs sangs rgyas //
analyzed: rdo rje skyil krung rdzogs sangs rgyas //
translated: The perfect buddha in vajra posture.

original: zhes byung ste ji ltar sprul pa'i sku sh'akya thub pa rdo rje'i gdan la rdo rje'i skyil krung du mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa de bzhin du rdo rje rtse lnga'i mtshan nyid rdo rje rgya gram gyi @261a * //
analyzed: zhes byung ste ji ltar sprul pa'i sku sh'akya thub pa rdo rje'i gdan la rdo rje'i skyil krung du mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa de bzhin du rdo rje rtse lnga'i mtshan nyid rdo rje rgya gram gyi @261a * //
translated: Just as the emanation body Shakyamuni became perfectly enlightened in the vajra posture on the vajra seat, in the same way, the five-pronged vajra, characterized by the vajra cross,

original: tshul du thabs dang shes rab kyi yan lag phan tshun du bsnol ba las rtog pa dang bral ba'i bde ba chen po rtogs pa gang yin pa de la de skad ces bya zhing /
analyzed: tshul du thabs dang shes rab kyi yan lag phan tshun du bsnol ba las rtog pa dang bral ba'i bde ba chen po rtogs pa gang yin pa de la de skad ces bya zhing /
translated: That which is called “great bliss free from conceptualization” is realized from the mutual combination of the branches of method and wisdom.

original: de lta bu'i bde ba chen po nyid kyi mtshan dang dpe byad la sogs pa sangs rgyas kyi chos mtha' dag 'dzin par mdzad pa ni /🔽sangs rgyas 'gro ba'i chos 'dzin pa //
analyzed: de lta bu'i bde ba chen po nyid kyi mtshan dang dpe byad la sogs pa sangs rgyas kyi chos mtha' dag 'dzin par mdzad pa ni / sangs rgyas 'gro ba'i chos 'dzin pa //
translated: The great bliss itself holds all the qualities of a buddha, such as the signs and indications.

original: zhes gsungs te /
analyzed: zhes gsungs te /
translated: It holds the qualities of the buddhas for migrating beings.

original: de nyid bdun pa'i don la dang po'i tshig go //
analyzed: de nyid bdun pa'i don la dang po'i tshig go //
translated: The meaning of the seventh [line] is the first [line].

original: dpal ldan sangs rgyas padma skyes //
analyzed: dpal ldan sangs rgyas padma skyes //
translated: The glorious buddha born from a lotus

original: zhes pa ni padma ni rtag can te /
analyzed: zhes pa ni padma ni rtag can te /
translated: is a lotus because it is permanent.🔽The bodhicitta that is the cause of the complete body, speech, and mind

original: sku gsung thugs yongs su rdzogs par byed rgyu'i rgyu byang chub kyi sems de la gnas shing /
analyzed: sku gsung thugs yongs su rdzogs par byed rgyu'i rgyu byang chub kyi sems de la gnas shing /
translated: resides in that.

original: de nyid rtog pa chen po'i tshul gyis lnga pa dang bdun pa 'dom pa'i tshig ste /
analyzed: de nyid rtog pa chen po'i tshul gyis lnga pa dang bdun pa 'dom pa'i tshig ste /
translated: That is the meaning of the fifth and seventh [lines], which are connected by the method of the great thought.

original: padma las skyes shing padma ru skyes zhes bya la /
analyzed: padma las skyes shing padma ru skyes zhes bya la /
translated: It is called “born from a lotus” and “born in a lotus.”

original: de nyid kyi steng gi padma dang / 'og gi padma dang zhes grags so //
analyzed: de nyid kyi steng gi padma dang / 'og gi padma dang zhes grags so //
translated: The upper lotus and the lower lotus are well known.

original: kun mkhyen ye shes mdzod 'dzin pa //
analyzed: kun mkhyen ye shes mdzod 'dzin pa //
translated: Holder of the treasury of omniscient wisdom,

original: zhes pa ni gsang ba'i dbang gi yon tan bshad pa ste /
analyzed: zhes pa ni gsang ba'i dbang gi yon tan bshad pa ste /
translated: This explains the qualities of the secret empowerment.

original: ces bya ba nyid do //
analyzed: ces bya ba nyid do //

analyzed: rtogs par dka' zhing de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku 'dzin par 'dod pas na /

analyzed: rdo rje zab mo dzin dzik / ces bya'o //

original: rdo rje blo gros don bzhin rig / ces bya la de nyid pha rol tu phyin pa bcu la sogs pa pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad rdzogs pa dang / gsang ba'i padma chos kyi dbyings kyi mtshan nyid dang / pha rol tu phyin pa'i sa rab tu dga' ba nas rdo rje 'dzin pa chen po go 'phang gi sa dang mthun par cha phra zhing lto ba yangs pa /
analyzed: rdo rje blo gros don bzhin rig / ces bya la de nyid pha rol tu phyin pa bcu la sogs pa pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad rdzogs pa dang / gsang ba'i padma chos kyi dbyings kyi mtshan nyid dang / pha rol tu phyin pa'i sa rab tu dga' ba nas rdo rje 'dzin pa chen po go 'phang gi sa dang mthun par cha phra zhing lto ba yangs pa /
translated: Since he is the perfection of all the perfections, such as the ten perfections, and since he is the secret lotus, which is characterized by the dharmadhatu, and since he is the stage of perfection, which is the stage of the Joyous and so forth, and since he is the stage that is concordant with the stage of the great vajra holder, he is the subtle part and the spacious belly.

original: ston ka'i dus zla ba yongs su rdzogs pa'i zla ba ltar dri ma dang bral bar gnas pa ni gsang ba'i rdo rje mnyam par sbyar ba'i gnas skabs ni gong nas gong du bde ba 'phel ba'i phyir na //🔽pha rol phyin pa kun rdzogs pa //🔽sa rnams kun gyi rgyan dang ldan //🔽zhes bya la /

translated: Abiding free from stains like the full autumn moon is the occasion of the secret vajra union, which is the increase of bliss higher and higher.

original: byang chub kyi sems rdo rje'i bum pa'i nang na gnas pa ni yang dag pa'i ye shes zla ba'i dkyil 'khor ltar rnam par rtog pa'i 'ching ba gdung ba chen po rims dang 'dra ba sel bar mdzad pa gang yin pa de la de skad ces bya la
analyzed: byang chub kyi sems rdo rje'i bum pa'i nang na gnas pa ni yang dag pa'i ye shes zla ba'i dkyil 'khor ltar rnam par rtog pa'i 'ching ba gdung ba chen po rims dang 'dra ba sel bar mdzad pa gang yin pa de la de skad ces bya la
translated: The one abiding in the vase of the vajra mind of enlightenment is so called because he is the one who, like a full moon of perfect pristine consciousness, removes the great torment of the fetters of conceptuality, which is like a fever.

original: / des myur ba nyid du ye shes chen po'i mtshan nyid thob par byed cing phyag rgya bzhi'i bdag nyid dang ldan pa ni gzhon nu ma'i pra phab pa dang 'dra bar gnas pa na /

translated: That quickly causes the attainment of the characteristic of great pristine consciousness. When the one endowed with the nature of the four seals abides like a young girl’s divination,

analyzed: zhes bya ba ni dus gsum gyi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mngon par sangs rgyas pa'i gnas gsang ba'i padma yin te /
