translated: The qualities are its qualities and activities.

original: de bas na mnyam pa nyid dang bya ba grub pa'i sngon du 'gro bas kun gyi dus su bshad pa yin la /
analyzed: de bas na mnyam pa nyid dang bya ba grub pa'i sngon du 'gro bas kun gyi dus su bshad pa yin la /
translated: Therefore, since it precedes the sameness and activities, it is explained at all times.

original: de nyid nges pa lnga'i tshul du bshad pa ste bzhi pa'o //
analyzed: de nyid nges pa lnga'i tshul du bshad pa ste bzhi pa'o //
translated: That is the explanation of the five certainties.

original: de ltar ye shes dang sku dang gsung dang thugs rnams bstan nas /
analyzed: de ltar ye shes dang sku dang gsung dang thugs rnams bstan nas /
translated: Having explained the pristine consciousness, body, speech, and mind,🔽now, the explanation of the field of the pristine consciousness of the dhatu:

original: da ni de rnams yon tan du 'gyur ba mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes kyi bdag nyid du bshad pa ni /
analyzed: da ni de rnams yon tan du 'gyur ba mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes kyi bdag nyid du bshad pa ni /
translated: Now, the explanation of those as the nature of the gnosis of uniformity, which is the quality, is as follows.

original: 'dod pa'i don grub dam pa ste //🔽zhes pa la sogs pa gsungs te de nyid nga rgyal chen po'i gang zag rnams @263a * //
analyzed: 'dod pa'i don grub dam pa ste // zhes pa la sogs pa gsungs te de nyid nga rgyal chen po'i gang zag rnams @263a * //
translated: The supreme accomplishment of the desired aim🔽and so on.

original: 'dul ba'i don du nga rgyal chen po'i sku rin che 'byung ldan ni /
analyzed: 'dul ba'i don du nga rgyal chen po'i sku rin che 'byung ldan ni /
translated: For the purpose of taming those persons of great pride, the great pride of the body of Ratnasaṃbhava

original: nor bu rin po che'i rgyal mtshan gyis gdul bya'i skye bo thams cad kyi 'dod pa'i don thams cad grub par mdzad pa gang yin pa de la de skad ces bya zhing /
analyzed: nor bu rin po che'i rgyal mtshan gyis gdul bya'i skye bo thams cad kyi 'dod pa'i don thams cad grub par mdzad pa gang yin pa de la de skad ces bya zhing /
translated: is called “the one who accomplishes all the desired aims of all the beings to be tamed with the victory banner of the precious jewel.”

original: de nyid kyi nga rgyal nye bar mtshon nas 'dod chags la sogs pa thams cad nyon mongs pa nga rgyal 'gro ba'i rgyu yin la /
analyzed: de nyid kyi nga rgyal nye bar mtshon nas 'dod chags la sogs pa thams cad nyon mongs pa nga rgyal 'gro ba'i rgyu yin la /
translated: Having illustrated that very pride, all of desire and so on are the cause of the pride of the afflictions.

original: de nyid yang dag par sbyong ba'i phyir na /
analyzed: de nyid yang dag par sbyong ba'i phyir na /
translated: Because of that, in order to purify them,

original: ngan song thams cad rnam sbyong ba //
analyzed: ngan song thams cad rnam sbyong ba //
translated: all bad migrations are purified.

original: zhes bya'o // mgon po sems can kun gyi mchog / ces pa ni de ltar nyon mongs pa thams cad kyi yid yongs su dag pa las mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes ni bdag gzhan gyi rgyud mnyam ste /
analyzed: zhes bya'o // mgon po sems can kun gyi mchog / ces pa ni de ltar nyon mongs pa thams cad kyi yid yongs su dag pa las mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes ni bdag gzhan gyi rgyud mnyam ste /
translated: Thus, from the complete purification of the mind that is afflicted by all the afflictions, the gnosis of equality is the equality of one's own and others' mind streams.

original: de sems can thams cad dang mtshungs pa med pa dang / 'gro ba thams cad kyi mgon du gyur pas na de skad ces bya zhing /
analyzed: de sems can thams cad dang mtshungs pa med pa dang / 'gro ba thams cad kyi mgon du gyur pas na de skad ces bya zhing /
translated: Since that is the same for all sentient beings and is the protector of all transmigrating beings, it is called that.

original: de nyid gdul bya'i skye bo rnams nges par grol bar mdzad pas na /
analyzed: de nyid gdul bya'i skye bo rnams nges par grol bar mdzad pas na /
translated: And since it definitely liberates the beings to be trained,

original: sems can thams cad grol bar byed //
analyzed: sems can thams cad grol bar byed //
translated: it liberates all sentient beings.

original: ces bya ba la 'dod chags dang zhe sdang la sogs pa rnams ni sma 'bebs pa'i phyir g-yul yin la /
analyzed: ces bya ba la 'dod chags dang zhe sdang la sogs pa rnams ni sma 'bebs pa'i phyir g-yul yin la /
translated: Since desire, hatred, and so on are the battle,

original: de nyid du ye shes chen po'i mtshan nyid ni pha rol gyi dpung 'joms par byed pa'i ngo bor gyur pa dang / ma rig pa la sogs pa'i mi shes pa'i bdag nyid ni gzhan la ltos pa med pa'i tshul gyis dregs pa yin la de rab tu 'joms par mdzad pas na /
analyzed: de nyid du ye shes chen po'i mtshan nyid ni pha rol gyi dpung 'joms par byed pa'i ngo bor gyur pa dang / ma rig pa la sogs pa'i mi shes pa'i bdag nyid ni gzhan la ltos pa med pa'i tshul gyis dregs pa yin la de rab tu 'joms par mdzad pas na /
translated: In that very place, the characteristic of great pristine wisdom is the nature of conquering the army of the opponent, and the nature of ignorance and so forth, which is the self of non-knowing, is the arrogance that does not depend on another.

original: nyon mongs g-yul du gcig dpa' ba //
analyzed: nyon mongs g-yul du gcig dpa' ba //
translated: Since it is the one hero in the battle of afflictions,

original: mi shes dgra yi dregs pa 'joms //🔽zhes bya ba nyid do //🔽blo ldan sgeg 'chang dpal dang ldan //
analyzed: mi shes dgra yi dregs pa 'joms // zhes bya ba nyid do // blo ldan sgeg 'chang dpal dang ldan //
translated: it conquers the arrogance of the enemy of non-knowing.

original: zhes pa ni 'jam dpal zhes bya ba nyid 'dis gzung ba ste /
analyzed: zhes pa ni 'jam dpal zhes bya ba nyid 'dis gzung ba ste /
translated: The one who is called Manjushri is the one who is glorious, holding the dance of the wise.

original: mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes 'di yang shes rab phul du byung ba'i mtshan nyid yin pa dang / rin po che'i rgyan gyis sems can rnams mdzes par mdzad pa bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs rdzogs par mdzad pa de la de skad ces bya la /
analyzed: mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes 'di yang shes rab phul du byung ba'i mtshan nyid yin pa dang / rin po che'i rgyan gyis sems can rnams mdzes par mdzad pa bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs rdzogs par mdzad pa de la de skad ces bya la /
translated: This pristine wisdom of equality is also the characteristic of excellent wisdom, and it is called that because it is the one who adorns sentient beings with the ornaments of jewels, and it is the one who completes the accumulations of merit and pristine wisdom.

original: sems can gdug pa dang ldan pa de rnams 'dul ba'i don du drag po'i sku gzugs ston kyang chos kyi dbyings las mi 'gyur ba'i phyir /
analyzed: sems can gdug pa dang ldan pa de rnams 'dul ba'i don du drag po'i sku gzugs ston kyang chos kyi dbyings las mi 'gyur ba'i phyir /
translated: In order to subdue those sentient beings who are possessed of evil, he displays a wrathful form, but he does not move from the dharmadhatu.

original: brtan po mi sdug gzugs 'chang ba //
analyzed: brtan po mi sdug gzugs 'chang ba //
translated: Thus, he is called “steadfast, wearing an ugly form.”🔽And, in that way, by the power of the stage of the perfection of the Great Vehicle, he acts in ever higher ways.

original: zhes bya la de nyid rigs brgya'i mtshan nyid kyis phyogs thams cad du gshegs par mdzad pa gang yin pa de lta bu'i tshul gyis theg pa chen po yongs su rdzogs pa'i go 'phang gi stobs kyis gong nas gong du spyod par mdzad pa gang yin pa de🔽la de skad bya la /
analyzed: zhes bya la de nyid rigs brgya'i mtshan nyid kyis phyogs thams cad du gshegs par mdzad pa gang yin pa de lta bu'i tshul gyis theg pa chen po yongs su rdzogs pa'i go 'phang gi stobs kyis gong nas gong du spyod par mdzad pa gang yin pa de la de skad bya la /
translated: Thus, he is called “the one who goes everywhere by the characteristics of the one hundred families.”

original: lag pa brgya po kun bskyod cing //
analyzed: lag pa brgya po kun bskyod cing //
translated: He shakes all of his one hundred hands

original: gom @263b pa'i stobs kyis gar byed pa //
analyzed: gom @263b pa'i stobs kyis gar byed pa //
translated: and dances with the power of his steps.

original: nyid do // dpal ldan lag pa rgyas gang la //
analyzed: nyid do // dpal ldan lag pa rgyas gang la //
translated: He is the glorious one with outstretched arms.

original: zhes pa ni de ltar bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs yongs su rdzogs pa'i rigs brgya la sogs pas ni sems can rnams kyi nyon mongs pa mdzad pa ni grol ba'i lam la nges par 'jog pa'i phyir de skad ces bya'o //
analyzed: zhes pa ni de ltar bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs yongs su rdzogs pa'i rigs brgya la sogs pas ni sems can rnams kyi nyon mongs pa mdzad pa ni grol ba'i lam la nges par 'jog pa'i phyir de skad ces bya'o //
translated: Thus, by means of the hundred families and so forth, which are the complete accumulations of merit and wisdom, the deeds of sentient beings are said to be “definitely placed on the path of liberation.”

original: de lta bu'i gzugs kyis nam mkha'i mthar thug pa gdul bya gang dang gang na gnas pa de dang de na bskyod pa'i gzugs kyis gnas pa ni /🔽nam mkha' khyab pa gar byed pa //
analyzed: de lta bu'i gzugs kyis nam mkha'i mthar thug pa gdul bya gang dang gang na gnas pa de dang de na bskyod pa'i gzugs kyis gnas pa ni / nam mkha' khyab pa gar byed pa //
translated: By means of such a form, abiding in the form that moves in whatever place there are disciples, up to the end of space,

original: zhes bya zhing /
analyzed: zhes bya zhing /
translated: it is said to be “dancing, pervading space.”

original: de nyid kyis sa dang po rab tu dga' ba nas sa bcu gsum pa rdo rje 'dzin pa chen po'i bar du yongs su dga' ba'i snying po bde ba chen po'i mtshan nyid rtse gcig pa /
analyzed: de nyid kyis sa dang po rab tu dga' ba nas sa bcu gsum pa rdo rje 'dzin pa chen po'i bar du yongs su dga' ba'i snying po bde ba chen po'i mtshan nyid rtse gcig pa /
translated: By means of that, it is said to “traverse and conquer” the single-pointed nature of the essence of complete joy, the characteristic of great bliss, from the first stage, Very Joyful, up to the thirteenth stage, Great Vajradhara,

original: spros pa thams cad dang bral bas gnon cing bgrod par mdzad pa ni /🔽sa yi dkyil 'khor bzhi yi khyon //
analyzed: spros pa thams cad dang bral bas gnon cing bgrod par mdzad pa ni / sa yi dkyil 'khor bzhi yi khyon //
translated: free from all elaborations.🔽The soles of one foot conquer

original: rkang pa ya gcig mthil gyis gnon //
analyzed: rkang pa ya gcig mthil gyis gnon //
translated: the area of the four maṇḍalas of the earth.

original: zhes bya ba nyid do //
analyzed: zhes bya ba nyid do //
translated: This is the meaning.

original: rkang mtheb sen mo'i khyon gyis kyang //🔽tshangs pa'i yul sa rtse nas gnon //
analyzed: rkang mtheb sen mo'i khyon gyis kyang // tshangs pa'i yul sa rtse nas gnon //
translated: And with the tip of his toe

original: zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni /
translated: he presses down on the abode of Brahma.

original: de la rkang mtheb sen mo ni rkang pa'i bgros go 'phang yin la /🔽theg pa'i sgras ni lcags kyu bshad la /
analyzed: de la rkang mtheb sen mo ni rkang pa'i bgros go 'phang yin la / theg pa'i sgras ni lcags kyu bshad la /
translated: Here, the tip of the toe is the stage of the foot.🔽The word vehicle is explained as a hook.

original: sen mo'i sgras ni grur bshad do //
analyzed: sen mo'i sgras ni grur bshad do //
translated: The word toe is explained as a boat.

original: de ltar rdo rje 'dzin pa'i go 'phang las byung ba'i lcags kyu /
analyzed: de ltar rdo rje 'dzin pa'i go 'phang las byung ba'i lcags kyu /
translated: Thus, the hook that arises from the stage of the vajra holder

original: 'jig rten pa'i tshangs pa chen po'i nga rgyal ni dug dang bcas pa'i phyir rlung dang 'dra la de nyid nga rgyal gnas pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'jig rten pa'i tshangs pa chen po'i nga rgyal ni dug dang bcas pa'i phyir rlung dang 'dra la de nyid nga rgyal gnas pa'i phyir ro //
translated: is like the wind, because the pride of the worldly great Brahma is poisonous, and it is the abode of pride.

original: yul sa yin te de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs rje chen pos gnon par mdzad pas na de skad ces bya'o //
analyzed: yul sa yin te de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs rje chen pos gnon par mdzad pas na de skad ces bya'o //
translated: It is the abode, and is pressed down by the great compassion of the Tathagata.

original: de ltar ye shes chen po'i mtshan nyid 'di ni dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bya ba rdzogs pa'i don gcig nyid yin zhing legs par gsungs pa'i chos mtha' dag gis grub pa'i 'bras bu chen po'i don du gyur pas na /🔽don gcig gnyis med chos kyi don //
analyzed: de ltar ye shes chen po'i mtshan nyid 'di ni dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bya ba rdzogs pa'i don gcig nyid yin zhing legs par gsungs pa'i chos mtha' dag gis grub pa'i 'bras bu chen po'i don du gyur pas na / don gcig gnyis med chos kyi don //
translated: As such, this characteristic of great pristine consciousness is the sole meaning of the perfection of the deeds of all buddhas of the three times. Since it is the great result established by all the well-spoken Dharmas,

original: zhes bya zhing /
analyzed: zhes bya zhing /
translated: it is called “the meaning of the nondual, single meaning, the meaning of the Dharma.”

original: de nyid rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa don bzang po yin zhing 'khor ba'i 'jigs pa thams cad dang bral bas na /🔽dam pa'i don ni 'jigs pa med /
analyzed: de nyid rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa don bzang po yin zhing 'khor ba'i 'jigs pa thams cad dang bral bas na / dam pa'i don ni 'jigs pa med /
translated: Since that is endowed with the supreme of all aspects, it is the good meaning, and since it is free from all the fears of samsara,

original: ces bya la /
analyzed: ces bya la /
translated: it is called “the ultimate meaning is fearless.”

original: ye shes chen po'i don de nyid rang rig pa'i phyi rol gyi don rnam pa sna tshogs par snang zhing shes pa la phyi rol na med pa'i phyir na /🔽rnam rig sna tshogs gzugs don can //
analyzed: ye shes chen po'i don de nyid rang rig pa'i phyi rol gyi don rnam pa sna tshogs par snang zhing shes pa la phyi rol na med pa'i phyir na / rnam rig sna tshogs gzugs don can //
translated: Since that meaning of great pristine consciousness is self-knowing, the various aspects that appear and are cognized as external objects do not exist externally.

original: zhes bya ba nyid do //
analyzed: zhes bya ba nyid do //
translated: Therefore, it is called “the various consciousnesses have the meaning of form.”

original: sems dang rnam shes rgyud dang ldan //
analyzed: sems dang rnam shes rgyud dang ldan //
translated: The mind and consciousness are endowed with a continuum.

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa dang rnam par shes pa dang kun gzhi rnam par shes @264a * //
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa dang rnam par shes pa dang kun gzhi rnam par shes @264a * //
translated: Thus, and so forth.

original: pa dang yid ces bya bas na grangs te /
analyzed: pa dang yid ces bya bas na grangs te /
translated: The enumeration is by the terms consciousness, storehouse consciousness, and mind.

original: sna tshogs pa'i gzugs 'dzin pa dang / bag chags kyi rnam par snang ba'i phyir de skad ces bya zhing /
analyzed: sna tshogs pa'i gzugs 'dzin pa dang / bag chags kyi rnam par snang ba'i phyir de skad ces bya zhing /
translated: It is so called because it apprehends the various forms and because it appears as the aspect of habitual tendencies.

original: de nyid sems kyi rang bzhin gyi rnam par dag pa'i dngos po'i mtshan nyid don rab tu gsal bar gyur pa ni /
analyzed: de nyid sems kyi rang bzhin gyi rnam par dag pa'i dngos po'i mtshan nyid don rab tu gsal bar gyur pa ni /
translated: That itself is the nature of mind, the entity of the characteristic of purity, which is the object that is fully illuminated.

original: dngos don ma lus rnams la dga' //
analyzed: dngos don ma lus rnams la dga' //
translated: It is said, It is the delight in all things without exception.

original: zhes bya ba nyid do //
analyzed: zhes bya ba nyid do //
translated: Thus, it is.

original: de lta bu'i ye shes chen po dngos po thams cad kyi bdag nyid du mtshungs pa'i lam thams cad ji lta bus gsal bar gyur cing gang gis thob ce na /🔽stong pa nyid dga' 'dod chags blo //
analyzed: de lta bu'i ye shes chen po dngos po thams cad kyi bdag nyid du mtshungs pa'i lam thams cad ji lta bus gsal bar gyur cing gang gis thob ce na / stong pa nyid dga' 'dod chags blo //
translated: In that way, by what is that great wisdom, which is the path equal to the nature of all things, illuminated and attained?

original: zhes pa la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: zhes pa la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: It is said, The mind of passion for emptiness, and so forth.

original: de la shes rab ye shes kyi dbang gi dus su thob pa'i lhan cig skyes pa'i ye shes ni chos kyi dbyings la sogs pa bral ba'i mtshan nyid bde ba chen po la mngon par zhen pas na 'dod chags zhes bya la /🔽de nyid chen po'i mtshan nyid du gnas pas na rnam par rtog pa'i tshogs mtha' dag 'gags pas na stong pa zhes bya zhing de nyid so so'i skye bo la sogs pa'i 'dod chags 'dzag pa dang bcas pa'i bde ba mngon par zhen pa ngan 'gro'i rgyur gyur
analyzed: de la shes rab ye shes kyi dbang gi dus su thob pa'i lhan cig skyes pa'i ye shes ni chos kyi dbyings la sogs pa bral ba'i mtshan nyid bde ba chen po la mngon par zhen pas na 'dod chags zhes bya la / de nyid chen po'i mtshan nyid du gnas pas na rnam par rtog pa'i tshogs mtha' dag 'gags pas na stong pa zhes bya zhing de nyid so so'i skye bo la sogs pa'i 'dod chags 'dzag pa dang bcas pa'i bde ba mngon par zhen pa ngan 'gro'i rgyur gyur
translated: The simultaneously born gnosis obtained at the time of the wisdom exalted wisdom empowerment is called “passion” because it is attached to the great bliss that is the characteristic of separation, the dharmadhatu, and so on.🔽Since it abides as the characteristic of the great reality, it is called “emptiness” because it stops the entire multitude of conceptual thoughts.

original: pa spangs pa nyid la /🔽srid pa'i 'dod chags sogs spangs pa //
analyzed: pa spangs pa nyid la / srid pa'i 'dod chags sogs spangs pa //
translated: That itself is the abandonment of the attachment of ordinary beings and so on, which is the cause of bad rebirth, because it is attachment to bliss.

original: zhes bya ba nyid do //
analyzed: zhes bya ba nyid do //
translated: It is the abandonment of the passion of existence and so on.

original: srid gsum dga' ba chen po pa //
analyzed: srid gsum dga' ba chen po pa //
translated: It is the great joy of the three existences.

original: zhes bya ba ni skad cig ma la 'dod pa dang gzugs dang gzugs med pa'i khams gsum pa thams cad bde ba chen por gcig pa'i phyir na /
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni skad cig ma la 'dod pa dang gzugs dang gzugs med pa'i khams gsum pa thams cad bde ba chen por gcig pa'i phyir na /
translated: Because in a single instant all three realms—the desire realm, the form realm, and the formless realm—are one in great bliss, it is the great joy of the three existences.

original: khams gsum pa la de skad ces bya zhing /
analyzed: khams gsum pa la de skad ces bya zhing /
translated: The three realms are called that.

original: rnam par rtog pa'i tshogs mtha' dag sreg par byed pa dang ye shes chen po'i stobs gong nas gong du 'phel bar byed pa dang / nyes pa'i dri ma thams cad dang bral ba'i phyir na /
analyzed: rnam par rtog pa'i tshogs mtha' dag sreg par byed pa dang ye shes chen po'i stobs gong nas gong du 'phel bar byed pa dang / nyes pa'i dri ma thams cad dang bral ba'i phyir na /
translated: Because it burns up the entire host of conceptual thoughts, increases the power of great wisdom more and more, and is free from all the stains of faults,

original: sprin dkar dag pa bzhin du dkar //🔽zhes bya ba nyid do //
analyzed: sprin dkar dag pa bzhin du dkar // zhes bya ba nyid do //
translated: it is white like a pure white cloud.

original: dkar ba'i sgras ni sred pa las gyur pa'i dga' ba dang stobs zhes brjod do //
analyzed: dkar ba'i sgras ni sred pa las gyur pa'i dga' ba dang stobs zhes brjod do //
translated: The word “white” refers to the joy and power that come from craving.

original: 'od bzang ston ka'i zla ba'i 'od //
analyzed: 'od bzang ston ka'i zla ba'i 'od //
translated: It has an excellent light like the light of an autumn moon.

original: ces pa ni thabs kyi gsang ba'i rdo rje las byung ba'i byang chub kyi sems ni dri ma dang bral ba'i phyir /
analyzed: ces pa ni thabs kyi gsang ba'i rdo rje las byung ba'i byang chub kyi sems ni dri ma dang bral ba'i phyir /
translated: The bodhicitta that comes from the secret method vajra is free from stains.

original: ston ka'i zla ba'i dkyil 'khor ltar gsal ba yin la /
analyzed: ston ka'i zla ba'i dkyil 'khor ltar gsal ba yin la /
translated: It is clear like the orb of an autumn moon.

original: de las byung ba'i bde ba chen po ni zla ba'i 'od zer ltar ma rig pa'i mun pa thams cad sel bar byed pa'i phyir na de skad ces bya la /
analyzed: de las byung ba'i bde ba chen po ni zla ba'i 'od zer ltar ma rig pa'i mun pa thams cad sel bar byed pa'i phyir na de skad ces bya la /
translated: The great bliss that comes from that is like the light rays of the moon, which remove all the darkness of ignorance.

original: shes rab ma'i gsang ba'i padma las byung ba'i byang sems ni rang byung gi me tog dang 'dres pa'i phyir na /
analyzed: shes rab ma'i gsang ba'i padma las byung ba'i byang sems ni rang byung gi me tog dang 'dres pa'i phyir na /
translated: The bodhicitta that arises from the secret lotus of the wisdom consort is mixed with the self arisen flower, and therefore

original: nyi ma shar ba'i dkyil @264b 'khor ltar dmar skyar snang zhing /
analyzed: nyi ma shar ba'i dkyil @264b 'khor ltar dmar skyar snang zhing /
translated: it appears as a reddish color like the orb of the rising sun.

original: de nyid dri ma dang bral ba dang rab tu dang ba'i bdag nyid du gnas pa mdzes pa'i phyir na /
analyzed: de nyid dri ma dang bral ba dang rab tu dang ba'i bdag nyid du gnas pa mdzes pa'i phyir na /
translated: Since that very bodhicitta is free from stains and abides as the nature of utter lucidity, it is beautiful.

original: nyi ma shar ka'i dkyil ltar mdzes //🔽zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: nyi ma shar ka'i dkyil ltar mdzes // zhes bya ba la /
translated: It is beautiful like the orb of the rising sun.

original: de las 'byung ba chen po ni nyi dkyil gyi 'od ltar spros pa dang bral ba'i chags pa chen por gnas pa ni /
analyzed: de las 'byung ba chen po ni nyi dkyil gyi 'od ltar spros pa dang bral ba'i chags pa chen por gnas pa ni /
translated: The great elements that arise from that are the great passion free of elaborations, abiding like the light of the orb of the sun.

original: sen mo'i 'od ni shas cher dmar //
analyzed: sen mo'i 'od ni shas cher dmar //
translated: The light of the nails is predominantly red.

original: zhes bya ba nyid do //
analyzed: zhes bya ba nyid do //
translated: That is so.

original: thabs dang shes rab gnyis kyi byang sems dus mtshungs pa nyid las lhan cig skyes pa'i ye shes rnam par rtog pa thams cad dang bral ba tshig gi brjod pa thams cad dang bral ba bde ba chen po nyid rtse gcig pa'i sems kyis bsgom par bya'o zhes
analyzed: thabs dang shes rab gnyis kyi byang sems dus mtshungs pa nyid las lhan cig skyes pa'i ye shes rnam par rtog pa thams cad dang bral ba tshig gi brjod pa thams cad dang bral ba bde ba chen po nyid rtse gcig pa'i sems kyis bsgom par bya'o zhes
translated: From the simultaneous union of the bodhicitta of method and wisdom, the connate gnosis free from all conceptuality and all verbal expression is meditated on with a one-pointed mind of great bliss.🔽🔽

original: bya ba'i don to ;
analyzed: bya ba'i don to ;
translated: The meaning of the verse is that one should meditate with a one-pointed mind on the exalted wisdom of simultaneously born great bliss, free from all discursive thoughts, free from all verbal expressions, which arises from the simultaneous union of the two bodhicittas of method and wisdom.

original: / ci de 'dzag pa dang bcas pa la sogs pa thob par 'gyur ram de lta na ni so so'i skye bo tha mal pa rnams dang khyad par med do zhe na /🔽cod pan bzang po mthon ka'i rtse //
analyzed: / ci de 'dzag pa dang bcas pa la sogs pa thob par 'gyur ram de lta na ni so so'i skye bo tha mal pa rnams dang khyad par med do zhe na / cod pan bzang po mthon ka'i rtse //
translated: If one asks, “Is it obtained with emission and so forth? If so, then there is no difference from ordinary, common beings,”

original: zhes pas te /
analyzed: zhes pas te /
translated: the reply is:🔽The excellent crown jewel is on the peak of Meru.

original: de la cod pan ni mgo la bcings pa nyid la bya //
analyzed: de la cod pan ni mgo la bcings pa nyid la bya //
translated: The crown jewel is placed on the head.

original: bzang po ni yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che'i rgyan te mthon ka ni mthing nag ces bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: bzang po ni yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che'i rgyan te mthon ka ni mthing nag ces bya ba'i don to //
translated: The excellent is the ornament of the precious wish-fulfilling jewel. Meru is the blue-black mountain.

original: rang gi byang chub kyi sems kyi cod pan gyi gnas bde ba chen po'i 'khor lor rdo rje nor bu nas bkug ste cod pan du bya la rang gi gnas bzhag pa las zag pa med pa'i bde ba chen po skye'o zhes bya par dgongs so //🔽skra mchog mthon ka chen po 'chang //
analyzed: rang gi byang chub kyi sems kyi cod pan gyi gnas bde ba chen po'i 'khor lor rdo rje nor bu nas bkug ste cod pan du bya la rang gi gnas bzhag pa las zag pa med pa'i bde ba chen po skye'o zhes bya par dgongs so // skra mchog mthon ka chen po 'chang //
translated: The meaning is that one should summon the jewel from the vajra jewel to the place of the crown of one's bodhicitta, the cakra of great bliss, and place it on the crown.

original: zhes pa ni /
analyzed: zhes pa ni /
translated: The supreme hair is the great sapphire.

original: de nyid dus gsum gyi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi yon tan gyis brgyan cing rnam rtog rlung gis bskyod mi nus shing mi 'gyur ba gang yin pa de la de skad ces bya zhing /
analyzed: de nyid dus gsum gyi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi yon tan gyis brgyan cing rnam rtog rlung gis bskyod mi nus shing mi 'gyur ba gang yin pa de la de skad ces bya zhing /
translated: That is, it is adorned with the qualities of all tathāgatas of the three times and is unchanging, not moved by the winds of conceptuality.🔽That is called the supreme hair, the great sapphire.

original: de ni yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che de ltar dgos pa thams cad sgrub par byed pa dang bde ba chen po'i 'od zer gyis srid pa gsum gyi mun pa thams cad 'joms par byed cing rang gi rgyud nyid ro mnyam pa nyid kyis 'tshed par🔽byed pas na /
analyzed: de ni yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che de ltar dgos pa thams cad sgrub par byed pa dang bde ba chen po'i 'od zer gyis srid pa gsum gyi mun pa thams cad 'joms par byed cing rang gi rgyud nyid ro mnyam pa nyid kyis 'tshed par🔽byed pas na /
translated: That is the wish-fulfilling jewel that accomplishes all needs and the light rays of great bliss that destroy all the darkness of the three existences and cook one's continuum itself with the taste of sameness.

original: nor bu chen po 'od chags dpal //
analyzed: nor bu chen po 'od chags dpal //
translated: The great jewel is the glorious radiance.

original: zhes bya'o // de lta bu'i zag pa med pa'i bde ba'i phan yon bstan pa ni /
analyzed: zhes bya'o // de lta bu'i zag pa med pa'i bde ba'i phan yon bstan pa ni /
translated: The teaching of the benefits of such uncontaminated bliss is

original: sangs rgyas sprul pa'i rgyan dang ldan //🔽zhes pa la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: sangs rgyas sprul pa'i rgyan dang ldan // zhes pa la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: The emanations of the buddhas are the ornaments.

original: de ltar bde ba chen po de nyid las grub pas de bzhin gshegs pa de'i sprul pa dang 'dra bas bskal pa grangs med pa khams gsum pa rnams kyi spyi gtsug gi nor bu'i rgyan du gyur pa gang yin pa de la de skad ces bya zhing /
analyzed: de ltar bde ba chen po de nyid las grub pas de bzhin gshegs pa de'i sprul pa dang 'dra bas bskal pa grangs med pa khams gsum pa rnams kyi spyi gtsug gi nor bu'i rgyan du gyur pa gang yin pa de la de skad ces bya zhing /
translated: Thus, since the emanations of the tathāgata are similar to the emanations of that great bliss, the one who is the crest jewel of the three realms for a countless eon is called that.

original: de nyid kyi sprul pa'i gzugs rnam pa sna tshogs pa /
analyzed: de nyid kyi sprul pa'i gzugs rnam pa sna tshogs pa /
translated: The various forms of those emanations

original: 'jig rten gyi khams brgya phrag stong la sogs par 'gro ba'i @265a * //
analyzed: 'jig rten gyi khams brgya phrag stong la sogs par 'gro ba'i @265a * //
translated: are the benefit for migrating beings in the hundreds of thousands of world systems.

original: don mdzad pa nyid dang rdzu 'phrul chen po'i thugs kyis skad cig pas 'dul bya'i zhing thams cad shes pa'i phyir na /
analyzed: don mdzad pa nyid dang rdzu 'phrul chen po'i thugs kyis skad cig pas 'dul bya'i zhing thams cad shes pa'i phyir na /
translated: Since the mind of great magic knows all the fields of those to be tamed in an instant,

original: 'jig rten khams brgya kun bskyod pa //
analyzed: 'jig rten khams brgya kun bskyod pa //
translated: The hundreds of world systems are all shaken.

original: rdzu 'phrul rkang pa'i stobs chen ldan //
analyzed: rdzu 'phrul rkang pa'i stobs chen ldan //
translated: The power of the bases of magical powers.

original: zhes bya ba nyid do //
analyzed: zhes bya ba nyid do //
translated: This is the meaning.

original: yongs su rdzogs pa'i mthar mngon par byang chub na bzhugs pa'i gnas skabs na sems can thams cad mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar mdzad par zhal gyis bzhes pa nyid ni sngon gyi smon lam rjes su dran zhes bya la /
analyzed: yongs su rdzogs pa'i mthar mngon par byang chub na bzhugs pa'i gnas skabs na sems can thams cad mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar mdzad par zhal gyis bzhes pa nyid ni sngon gyi smon lam rjes su dran zhes bya la /
translated: When fully perfected, at the time of abiding in manifest enlightenment, the promise to bring all sentient beings to manifest, complete enlightenment is called “recollecting previous aspirations.”

original: de nyid mi bsnyel ba'i tshul gyis rab tu 'dzin pa gang yin pa de la de skad ces bya la /
analyzed: de nyid mi bsnyel ba'i tshul gyis rab tu 'dzin pa gang yin pa de la de skad ces bya la /
translated: That which fully holds that without forgetting is called that.

original: de nyid 'gro ba rnams la gsum gzung ba'i tshul gyi sangs rgyas dang chos dang dge 'dun dang / lha nyid rjes su dran par rtse gcig pa'i tshul gyis gnas pa'i phyir na /🔽dran pa bzhi po ting 'dzin rgyal //
analyzed: de nyid 'gro ba rnams la gsum gzung ba'i tshul gyi sangs rgyas dang chos dang dge 'dun dang / lha nyid rjes su dran par rtse gcig pa'i tshul gyis gnas pa'i phyir na / dran pa bzhi po ting 'dzin rgyal //
translated: That itself is the way of holding the three refuges for beings, the Buddha, Dharma, and Saṅgha, and it is the way of abiding in the one-pointed recollection of the deity.

original: zhes bya zhing /
analyzed: zhes bya zhing /
translated: The four recollections are the king of samādhis.

original: de nyid kyis phyin ci log gi shes pa la skyed pa'i dri ma rnams sel bar mdzad pa dang / sprul pa'i gzugs kyis 'khor ba'i gnas nas kyang srid pa'i bcings pa las grol ba'i phyir gnas pa dang / de nyid mtshan dang dpe byad dang /
analyzed: de nyid kyis phyin ci log gi shes pa la skyed pa'i dri ma rnams sel bar mdzad pa dang / sprul pa'i gzugs kyis 'khor ba'i gnas nas kyang srid pa'i bcings pa las grol ba'i phyir gnas pa dang / de nyid mtshan dang dpe byad dang /
translated: By that, the stains that are produced by mistaken consciousness are removed, and by the form of the emanation, one is liberated from the bondage of existence in the state of samsara.

original: stobs dang mi 'jigs pa la sogs pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan dpag tu med pa rnams kyi rgyur gyur pas na /
analyzed: stobs dang mi 'jigs pa la sogs pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan dpag tu med pa rnams kyi rgyur gyur pas na /
translated: Since that is the cause of the limitless qualities of the tathagatas, such as the marks and the signs of a great being, the powers, the fearlessnesses, and so on,

original: byang chub yan lag me tog spos //🔽de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan mtsho //
analyzed: byang chub yan lag me tog spos // de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan mtsho //
translated: it is the flower of the branches of enlightenment.

original: zhes bya ba nyid do //
analyzed: zhes bya ba nyid do //
translated: It is the ocean of the qualities of the tathagatas.

original: lam gyi yan lag brgyad tshul rig / ces bya ba ni /
analyzed: lam gyi yan lag brgyad tshul rig / ces bya ba ni /
translated: The knowledge of the way of the eight branches of the path

original: de lta bu'i bde ba chen pos 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad kyi tshul yang dag par rig pa dang / 'bras bu yongs su rdzogs pa'i mtshan nyid chos kyi sku yongs su rig par gyur pa gang yin pa de ni /
analyzed: de lta bu'i bde ba chen pos 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad kyi tshul yang dag par rig pa dang / 'bras bu yongs su rdzogs pa'i mtshan nyid chos kyi sku yongs su rig par gyur pa gang yin pa de ni /
translated: is the knowledge of the way of the eight branches of the arya path by means of such great bliss and the knowledge of the dharmakaya, which is characterized by the complete perfection of the result.

original: yang dag sangs rgyas lam rig pa //
analyzed: yang dag sangs rgyas lam rig pa //
translated: The path of the perfect Buddha is known.

original: zhes bya ba nyid do //
analyzed: zhes bya ba nyid do //
translated: This is the meaning.

original: sems can kun la shas cher chags //
analyzed: sems can kun la shas cher chags //
translated: He is greatly attached to all sentient beings.

original: zhes bya ba ni nam mkha' 'di grub pa'i rten dang 'dra bar gzugs kyi skus ni khams gsum gyi sems can thams cad la bu gcig pa ltar byams pa chen po'i tshul gyis gnas pa de la de skad ces bya zhing /
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni nam mkha' 'di grub pa'i rten dang 'dra bar gzugs kyi skus ni khams gsum gyi sems can thams cad la bu gcig pa ltar byams pa chen po'i tshul gyis gnas pa de la de skad ces bya zhing /
translated: This is because, like the basis for the establishment of space, the rupakaya abides in the manner of great love for all sentient beings of the three realms, like an only child.

original: de nyid rnam par rtog pa thams cad dang bral ba'i mtshan nyid ston ka'i nam mkha' dang ba ltar dri ma dang bral zhing mi 'gyur bar gnas pa ni /🔽nam mkha' lta bur chags pa med //
analyzed: de nyid rnam par rtog pa thams cad dang bral ba'i mtshan nyid ston ka'i nam mkha' dang ba ltar dri ma dang bral zhing mi 'gyur bar gnas pa ni / nam mkha' lta bur chags pa med //
translated: That itself, free from all concepts, is free from stains, abiding without changing, like the clarity of an autumn sky.

original: ces bya ba nyid do //
analyzed: ces bya ba nyid do //
translated: It is said, “Like space, it is without attachment.”

original: de ltar ye shes chen po'i mtshan nyid ni khams gsum gyi sems can thams cad kyi sems la 'jug pa'i phyir na /
analyzed: de ltar ye shes chen po'i mtshan nyid ni khams gsum gyi sems can thams cad kyi sems la 'jug pa'i phyir na /
translated: Thus, the characteristic of great wisdom is the entry into the mind of all sentient beings of the three realms.

original: sems can kun gyi yid la 'jug /
analyzed: sems can kun gyi yid la 'jug /
translated: It is said, “It enters the mind of all sentient beings.”

original: @265b ces bya zhing khams gsum gyi sems can thams cad la gang dang gang gis 'dul ba la de dang de'i gzugs kyis thog ma skye ba la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid rnams la de yongs su 'dzin pa'i mtshan nyid thogs pa med par 'jug pas na /
analyzed: @265b ces bya zhing khams gsum gyi sems can thams cad la gang dang gang gis 'dul ba la de dang de'i gzugs kyis thog ma skye ba la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid rnams la de yongs su 'dzin pa'i mtshan nyid thogs pa med par 'jug pas na /
translated: in the forms of those to be trained, he engages in the characteristics of birth, etc. without obstruction, through the characteristic of their complete retention.

original: sems can kun gyi yid ltar mgyogs //🔽zhes bya ba nyid do //
analyzed: sems can kun gyi yid ltar mgyogs // zhes bya ba nyid do //
translated: He is swift like the mind of all sentient beings.

original: sems can kun gyi dbang don shes //
analyzed: sems can kun gyi dbang don shes //
translated: He knows the meaning of the senses of all sentient beings.

original: zhes bya ba ni de ltar 'dul ba la nye bar brtson pa'i sems can rnams thabs gang yongs su shes pa 'jug pa zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni de ltar 'dul ba la nye bar brtson pa'i sems can rnams thabs gang yongs su shes pa 'jug pa zhes bya ba ste /
translated: Thus, he is engaged in knowing the means of training sentient beings.

original: de nyid bdag dang gzhan gyi don chen por rab tu gyur pa yin la nges par 'byung ba'i tshul du shes pa gang yin pa de la de skad ces bya zhing /
analyzed: de nyid bdag dang gzhan gyi don chen por rab tu gyur pa yin la nges par 'byung ba'i tshul du shes pa gang yin pa de la de skad ces bya zhing /
translated: That is the great benefit for self and other, and that is the knowledge of the mode of definite emergence.

original: zhi ba chen po nges pa'i tshul gyis sems can gang dang gang gi rgyud la brlan pa de dang de'i yid nges par mdzad pa dang / de ltar rnam par rtog pa'i tshogs mtha' dag rab tu nub par gyur pa las de'i yid gong nas gong du zhen cing mi 'bral ba'i tshul du gnas na /🔽sems can kun gyi yid 'phrog pa //
analyzed: zhi ba chen po nges pa'i tshul gyis sems can gang dang gang gi rgyud la brlan pa de dang de'i yid nges par mdzad pa dang / de ltar rnam par rtog pa'i tshogs mtha' dag rab tu nub par gyur pa las de'i yid gong nas gong du zhen cing mi 'bral ba'i tshul du gnas na / sems can kun gyi yid 'phrog pa //
translated: And when the entire mass of conceptual thoughts has thus subsided, and that mind abides in a way that is ever more attached and not separate from that,

original: zhes bya ba nyid do ;
analyzed: zhes bya ba nyid do ;
translated: it is said to be “captivating the minds of all beings.”🔽That great bliss free from conceptual elaboration is known as the characteristic of great bliss in the aggregates of form, feeling, perception, formation, and consciousness.

original: / de lta bu'i spros pa dang bral ba'i bde ba chen po ni gzugs dang / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa rnams bde ba chen po'i mtshan nyid du rig pa ni phyin ci log gi shes pas bskyed pa gzugs su mngon par zhen pa la sogs pa spangs shing phyin ci log rtogs pas na /🔽phung po lnga po de nyid shes //
analyzed: / de lta bu'i spros pa dang bral ba'i bde ba chen po ni gzugs dang / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa rnams bde ba chen po'i mtshan nyid du rig pa ni phyin ci log gi shes pas bskyed pa gzugs su mngon par zhen pa la sogs pa spangs shing phyin ci log rtogs pas na / phung po lnga po de nyid shes //
translated: When one has abandoned the manifest clinging to form and so on, which is produced by distorted consciousness, and has realized the absence of distortion,

original: zhes bya zhing /
analyzed: zhes bya zhing /
translated: it is said to be “knowing those five aggregates.”

original: de ltar bde ba chen po byin gyis brlab pa'i gnas skabs nas kun nas nyon mongs pa'i phung po lnga rnam par dag / rnam par dag pa'i phung po lnga yongs su rdzogs par gyur la de nyid rnam par snang mdzad dang mi bskyod pa la sogs pa
analyzed: de ltar bde ba chen po byin gyis brlab pa'i gnas skabs nas kun nas nyon mongs pa'i phung po lnga rnam par dag / rnam par dag pa'i phung po lnga yongs su rdzogs par gyur la de nyid rnam par snang mdzad dang mi bskyod pa la sogs pa
translated: Thus, from the occasion of the consecration of great bliss, the five defiled aggregates are totally purified, and the five totally purified aggregates are totally perfected.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa rnam pa lnga'i bdag nyid du gnas pas na /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa rnam pa lnga'i bdag nyid du gnas pas na /
translated: Since that very [great bliss] exists as the nature of the five tathagatas, such as Vairocana and Akshobya,

original: rnam dag phung po lnga 'chang ba //
analyzed: rnam dag phung po lnga 'chang ba //
translated: it is called the bearer of the five totally pure aggregates.

original: zhes bya'o // de lta bu'i bde ba chen po'i spros pa dang bral ba nyid snod kyi gnas skabs kyi bdag nyid ni bdag dang gzhan gnyis ka na nges par 'byung ba rtog pa dang bral ba'i mtshan nyid yang dag pa'i mtha' la rab tu gnas pa dang /
analyzed: zhes bya'o // de lta bu'i bde ba chen po'i spros pa dang bral ba nyid snod kyi gnas skabs kyi bdag nyid ni bdag dang gzhan gnyis ka na nges par 'byung ba rtog pa dang bral ba'i mtshan nyid yang dag pa'i mtha' la rab tu gnas pa dang /
translated: The freedom from the elaborations of such great bliss, which is the nature of the occasion of the vessel, is the perfect limit, which is characterized by the freedom from conceptuality, the definite emergence of both self and other, and the total stability in the perfect limit.

original: rgyu nus pa thogs pa med pa'i mtshan nyid 'dod pa dang gzugs dang gzugs med pa'i mtshan nyid las nges par 'byung ba'i bde ba chen po rab tu rtogs pa dang / de nyid chu bo chen po'i rgyun ltar lam gyi gnas skabs rgyun mi 'chad pa bde ba chen por rang dang gzhan gyi rnam pa'i tsha mtha' dag nub par gyur ba la @266a * //
analyzed: rgyu nus pa thogs pa med pa'i mtshan nyid 'dod pa dang gzugs dang gzugs med pa'i mtshan nyid las nges par 'byung ba'i bde ba chen po rab tu rtogs pa dang / de nyid chu bo chen po'i rgyun ltar lam gyi gnas skabs rgyun mi 'chad pa bde ba chen por rang dang gzhan gyi rnam pa'i tsha mtha' dag nub par gyur ba la @266a * //
translated: That very [great bliss] is the continuous state of the path, like the flow of a great river, in which all extremes of one's own and others' aspects subside in great bliss.

original: rab tu gnas nas lam gyi nges par 'byung ba dang / lam la nges par 'byung ba'i las thob /
analyzed: rab tu gnas nas lam gyi nges par 'byung ba dang / lam la nges par 'byung ba'i las thob /
translated: Having fully entered that, one attains the activity of the definite emergence of the path and the definite emergence of the path.🔽The definite emergence of the result is the perfect benefit for others, which is the benefit for other migrating beings through one's own definite emergence.

original: 'bras bu nges par 'byung ba ni bdag nyid nges par 'byung ba las gzhan gyi don phun sum tshogs pas 'gro ba gzhan la bdag nyid dang po thabs ji lta bus mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa de ltar phyin ci ma log pa'i tshul gyis ston par
analyzed: 'bras bu nges par 'byung ba ni bdag nyid nges par 'byung ba las gzhan gyi don phun sum tshogs pas 'gro ba gzhan la bdag nyid dang po thabs ji lta bus mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa de ltar phyin ci ma log pa'i tshul gyis ston par
translated: One teaches others the unmistaken method by which one became fully enlightened in the beginning.

original: mdzad cing / rgyud bzhi'i tshul du gnas par bstan pa ni /
analyzed: mdzad cing / rgyud bzhi'i tshul du gnas par bstan pa ni /
translated: The teaching that one abides in the manner of the four tantras is as follows:

original: nges 'byung kun gyi lam la gnas //🔽nges par 'byung ba kun la mkhas //
analyzed: nges 'byung kun gyi lam la gnas // nges par 'byung ba kun la mkhas //
translated: Abides in the path of all renunciation.🔽Skilful in all renunciation,

original: nges par 'byung ba kun ston pa //
analyzed: nges par 'byung ba kun ston pa //
translated: He teaches all renunciation.

original: zhes bya ba nyid do //
analyzed: zhes bya ba nyid do //
translated: Thus it is.

original: yan lag bcu gnyis srid rtsa bton //
analyzed: yan lag bcu gnyis srid rtsa bton //
translated: He has uprooted the root of existence with its twelve branches.

original: zhes pa ni de la yan lag bcu gnyis ni ma rig pa dang 'du byed la sogs pa nang rten cing 'brel pa bcu gnyis yin la de nyid yang dang yang du 'byung bas srid pa'i rtsa ba nyid do //
analyzed: zhes pa ni de la yan lag bcu gnyis ni ma rig pa dang 'du byed la sogs pa nang rten cing 'brel pa bcu gnyis yin la de nyid yang dang yang du 'byung bas srid pa'i rtsa ba nyid do //
translated: Here, the twelve branches are the twelve inner dependent originations beginning with ignorance and conditioning. Since they occur again and again, they are the root of existence.

original: de bde ba chen po spros pa dang bral bas phyin ci ma log pa'i tshul gyis bton pa gang yin pa de la de skad ces bya zhing /
analyzed: de bde ba chen po spros pa dang bral bas phyin ci ma log pa'i tshul gyis bton pa gang yin pa de la de skad ces bya zhing /
translated: Since he has uprooted them with great bliss free from conceptual elaborations in an unmistaken manner, he is so called.

original: de nyid rnam par dag pa las de bzhin gshegs pa'i gnas skabs dang sgyu ma lta bu'i mdzad pa bcu gnyis par du 'dzin par mdzad pas na /
analyzed: de nyid rnam par dag pa las de bzhin gshegs pa'i gnas skabs dang sgyu ma lta bu'i mdzad pa bcu gnyis par du 'dzin par mdzad pas na /
translated: Since he manifests the twelve deeds in the state of a tathagata through the purification of that,

original: dag pa rnam pa bcu gnyis 'chang //
analyzed: dag pa rnam pa bcu gnyis 'chang //
translated: He holds the twelve pure aspects.

original: zhes bya ba nyid do //
analyzed: zhes bya ba nyid do //
translated: Thus it is.

original: de nyid sdug bsngal dang kun 'byung ba dang 'gog pa dang lam gyi bden pa las yongs su grub pa bdag nyid du gnas pa /
analyzed: de nyid sdug bsngal dang kun 'byung ba dang 'gog pa dang lam gyi bden pa las yongs su grub pa bdag nyid du gnas pa /
translated: It is the very nature of the ultimate reality, which is established from the truth of suffering, the truth of the origin of suffering, the truth of the cessation of suffering, and the truth of the path.

original: bden bzhi'i tshul gyi rnam pa can //
analyzed: bden bzhi'i tshul gyi rnam pa can //
translated: It has the aspect of the mode of the four truths.

original: zhes bya la /
analyzed: zhes bya la /
translated: It is said:

original: mig gi rnam par shes pa la sogs pa rnam par dag pa las sa'i snying po la sogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' brgyad du nges par ldan pa ni /
analyzed: mig gi rnam par shes pa la sogs pa rnam par dag pa las sa'i snying po la sogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' brgyad du nges par ldan pa ni /
translated: From the purification of the eye consciousness and so forth, the eight bodhisattvas such as Kṣitigarbha are ascertained.

original: shes pa brgyad po rtogs pa 'chang //
analyzed: shes pa brgyad po rtogs pa 'chang //
translated: It holds the realization of the eight consciousnesses.🔽It is said:

original: zhes bya zhing de nyid chos kyi 'khor lo yongs su dag pa'i las ma rig pa la sogs pa nyid dag pa'i tshul gyi bden pa yin la des grol ba nges par ston pa'i tshul gyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i phun sum tshogs ba dang ldan pas /
analyzed: zhes bya zhing de nyid chos kyi 'khor lo yongs su dag pa'i las ma rig pa la sogs pa nyid dag pa'i tshul gyi bden pa yin la des grol ba nges par ston pa'i tshul gyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i phun sum tshogs ba dang ldan pas /
translated: It is the truth of the pure activity of the wheel of Dharma, the mode of the purification of ignorance and so forth. Since it is endowed with the perfection of the tathāgatas, it is the mode of definitely teaching liberation.

original: bden don rnam pa bcu gnyis ldan //
analyzed: bden don rnam pa bcu gnyis ldan //
translated: It has the twelve aspects of the meaning of the truth.

original: zhes bya ba nyid do //
analyzed: zhes bya ba nyid do //
translated: It is said:

original: de nyid rnam pa bcu drug rig / ces bya ba ni ye shes kyi sku'i sku dang gsung dang thugs dang ye shes dang chos kyi sku'i sku dang gsung dang thugs dang ye shes dang longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku'i sku dang gsung dang thugs dang ye shes dang
analyzed: de nyid rnam pa bcu drug rig / ces bya ba ni ye shes kyi sku'i sku dang gsung dang thugs dang ye shes dang chos kyi sku'i sku dang gsung dang thugs dang ye shes dang longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku'i sku dang gsung dang thugs dang ye shes dang
translated: The sixteen aspects of that are the knowledge.🔽The body, speech, mind, gnosis, body, speech, mind, and gnosis of the dharmakāya, and the body, speech, mind, and gnosis of the saṃbhogakāya,🔽

original: sbrul pa'i sku'i sku dang gsung dang thugs dang ye shes rnam par dag pa rig par gyur pa gang yin pa de la de skad ces bya la /
analyzed: sbrul pa'i sku'i sku dang gsung dang thugs dang ye shes rnam par dag pa rig par gyur pa gang yin pa de la de skad ces bya la /
translated: The one who knows the sixteen aspects is the one who knows the pure aspects of the body, speech, mind, and gnosis of the body of timeless awareness, the body, speech, mind, and gnosis of the body of ultimate enlightenment, the body, speech, mind, and gnosis of the body of perfect rapture, and the body, speech, mind, and gnosis of the body of manifestation.

original: rnam pa nyi shus byang chub pa //
analyzed: rnam pa nyi shus byang chub pa //
translated: Enlightened form is twentyfold.

original: zhes pa ni rgyu'i mtshan nyid kyi gnas skabs na sku dang gsung dang thugs dang ye shes dang chos kyi dbyings kyi mtshan nyid kyi sgo @266b nas de dag thams cad rnal 'byor gyi lam gyi gnas skabs su dga' ba dang / mchog tu dga' ba dang /
analyzed: zhes pa ni rgyu'i mtshan nyid kyi gnas skabs na sku dang gsung dang thugs dang ye shes dang chos kyi dbyings kyi mtshan nyid kyi sgo @266b nas de dag thams cad rnal 'byor gyi lam gyi gnas skabs su dga' ba dang / mchog tu dga' ba dang /
translated: In the context of the causal characteristics, all of these are experienced on the spiritual path of yoga as joy, supreme joy,

original: lhan cig skyes pa'i dga' ba dang / dga' bral gyi dga' ba'i tshul gyis rnam par phye bde la de skad ces bya'o //🔽rnam pa sangs rgyas kun rig mchog / ces bya ba ni de ltar rnam pa nyi shu mngon par byang chub pa'i bde ba chen po ni brtan pa dang g-yo ba'i dngos po thams cad gnyis su med par rtogs shing rang rig pa'i phung po'i bde ba chen
analyzed: lhan cig skyes pa'i dga' ba dang / dga' bral gyi dga' ba'i tshul gyis rnam par phye bde la de skad ces bya'o // rnam pa sangs rgyas kun rig mchog / ces bya ba ni de ltar rnam pa nyi shu mngon par byang chub pa'i bde ba chen po ni brtan pa dang g-yo ba'i dngos po thams cad gnyis su med par rtogs shing rang rig pa'i phung po'i bde ba chen
translated: The supreme awareness of all buddhas🔽The supreme awareness of all buddhas is the supreme bliss of manifest enlightenment in twenty aspects.

original: por rig cing /
analyzed: por rig cing /
translated: The supreme bliss of manifest enlightenment in twenty aspects is the realization of all things, both animate and inanimate, as nondual, and the awareness of the bliss of the aggregate of self-awareness as the supreme bliss.

original: de nyid 'jig rten pa'i bde ba las khyad par du 'phags pas de skad ces bya la /
analyzed: de nyid 'jig rten pa'i bde ba las khyad par du 'phags pas de skad ces bya la /
translated: Since that is superior to mundane bliss, it is called that.🔽That supreme bliss of self-awareness is not a continuum of bliss for oneself alone, like the meditative absorption of cessation of the śrāvakas.

original: rang rig pa'i bde ba chen po de nyid nyan thos 'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa ltar bdag nyid 'ba' zhig bde ba'i rgyun dang ldan pa ma yin zhing brtan pa dang g-yo ba dang dngos pos stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad
analyzed: rang rig pa'i bde ba chen po de nyid nyan thos 'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa ltar bdag nyid 'ba' zhig bde ba'i rgyun dang ldan pa ma yin zhing brtan pa dang g-yo ba dang dngos pos stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad
translated: It is the supreme bliss of the aggregate of self-awareness that is the cause of the bliss of all animate and inanimate things in the great trichiliocosm.

original: bde ba chen po'i gzugs kyi sprul pa dpag tu med pas khyab par byed cing /
analyzed: bde ba chen po'i gzugs kyi sprul pa dpag tu med pas khyab par byed cing /
translated: It pervades with immeasurable emanations of the form of great bliss.

original: sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa dang 'dra bas 'gro ba rnams kyi sdug bsngal sel bar mdzad pa ni /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa dang 'dra bas 'gro ba rnams kyi sdug bsngal sel bar mdzad pa ni /
translated: It performs the deeds of a buddha and thus acts to remove the suffering of migrating beings.

original: sangs rgyas kun gyi sprul pa'i sku //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kun gyi sprul pa'i sku //
translated: The emanation body of all buddhas

original: bye ba dpag med 'gyed pa po //
analyzed: bye ba dpag med 'gyed pa po //
translated: emanates immeasurable millions.

original: zhes pa nyid do //
analyzed: zhes pa nyid do //
translated: That is the meaning of this verse.

original: de lta bu'i bde ba chen po skad cig la dus kyi mtha'i skad cig ma dpag tu med pa thams cad bde ba chen po'i ngo bor rtogs pa gang yin pa de ni /🔽skad cig thams cad mngon par rtogs //
analyzed: de lta bu'i bde ba chen po skad cig la dus kyi mtha'i skad cig ma dpag tu med pa thams cad bde ba chen po'i ngo bor rtogs pa gang yin pa de ni / skad cig thams cad mngon par rtogs //
translated: The instant that such great bliss is realized as the entity of great bliss in all instants of time, which are immeasurable,

original: zhes bya zhing /
analyzed: zhes bya zhing /
translated: it is called “the realization of all instants.”

original: bde ba chen po nyid rnam par rtog pa thams cad zad par gyur cing /
analyzed: bde ba chen po nyid rnam par rtog pa thams cad zad par gyur cing /
translated: Great bliss itself is the exhaustion of all concepts and becomes nondual.

original: gnyis su med par gyur pa ni skad cig ma'i sgrar brjod cing skad cig ma ni ye shes dang gcig tu brjod cing ksha dang na ni ma ning gi rtags te /
analyzed: gnyis su med par gyur pa ni skad cig ma'i sgrar brjod cing skad cig ma ni ye shes dang gcig tu brjod cing ksha dang na ni ma ning gi rtags te /
translated: It is called “the instant” and the instant is said to be one with gnosis.

original: zad cing med pa zhes bya ba dang / 'dzag pa med pa zhes bya ba nyid do //
analyzed: zad cing med pa zhes bya ba dang / 'dzag pa med pa zhes bya ba nyid do //
translated: It is called “exhausted and nonexistent” and “without outflows.”

original: 'dir yang dus kyi mtha'i skad cig ma thams cad zad cing med par gyur pa dang / de nyid zag pa med pa'i bde ba nyid du gnas pas na de skad ces bya ste gang du yang 'gal ba med la /
analyzed: 'dir yang dus kyi mtha'i skad cig ma thams cad zad cing med par gyur pa dang / de nyid zag pa med pa'i bde ba nyid du gnas pas na de skad ces bya ste gang du yang 'gal ba med la /
translated: Here, all the moments of the end of time are exhausted and become nonexistent, and that itself abides as the bliss of the absence of outflows.

original: de nyid don dam pa'i byang chub kyi sems kyis dngos po'i don mtha' dag las rig par gyur pa ni /
analyzed: de nyid don dam pa'i byang chub kyi sems kyis dngos po'i don mtha' dag las rig par gyur pa ni /
translated: Since there is no contradiction anywhere, that itself is the ultimate bodhicitta.

original: sems kyi skad cig don kun rig pa nyid do //
analyzed: sems kyi skad cig don kun rig pa nyid do //
translated: The awareness of all topics is the awareness of all topics in a single moment of mind.🔽The one who understands the benefit of migrating beings

original: theg pa sna tshogs thabs tshul gyis //🔽'gro ba'i don la rtogs pa po //
analyzed: theg pa sna tshogs thabs tshul gyis // 'gro ba'i don la rtogs pa po //
translated: through various vehicles and methods.🔽In this context, the vehicles are the śrāvaka vehicle, the pratyekabuddha vehicle, and the bodhisattva vehicle.

original: zhes pa ni de la nyan thos kyi theg pa dang / rang rgyal gyi theg pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa rnams la rang rang gi lhag pa'i shes rab kyi ngo bos don gyi dngos po rnam pa sna tshogs pa yin la /🔽de lta bu'i thabs kyis @267a * //
analyzed: zhes pa ni de la nyan thos kyi theg pa dang / rang rgyal gyi theg pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa rnams la rang rang gi lhag pa'i shes rab kyi ngo bos don gyi dngos po rnam pa sna tshogs pa yin la /🔽de lta bu'i thabs kyis @267a * //
translated: The various topics are the topics of each one’s own superior insight.

original: 'gro ba gang dang gang la don gyi mtshan nyid nges par gyur pa de la de skad ces bya ste /
analyzed: 'gro ba gang dang gang la don gyi mtshan nyid nges par gyur pa de la de skad ces bya ste /
translated: The term vehicle is used for any group of beings who have ascertained the characteristics of the goal.

original: de ji lta ba bzhin du 'dir yang rtog pa'i bye brag gi chos kyis nyan thos dang / rang rgyal dang / byang chub sems dpa' dang / theg pa chen po la sogs pa rnams dang po nas rnam pa nyi shu'i bar du nges par tshang pa'i phyir na de skad bya ba nyid do //
analyzed: de ji lta ba bzhin du 'dir yang rtog pa'i bye brag gi chos kyis nyan thos dang / rang rgyal dang / byang chub sems dpa' dang / theg pa chen po la sogs pa rnams dang po nas rnam pa nyi shu'i bar du nges par tshang pa'i phyir na de skad bya ba nyid do //
translated: Just as in the world, here too, the terms hearer vehicle, solitary victor vehicle, bodhisattva vehicle, great vehicle, and so on are used because each of these twenty aspects is complete in each of these vehicles.

original: theg pa gsum gyi nges 'byung la //🔽theg ba gcig gi 'bras bur gnas //
analyzed: theg pa gsum gyi nges 'byung la // theg ba gcig gi 'bras bur gnas //
translated: The three vehicles' definite exits

original: zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni /
translated: are the abodes of the result of the single vehicle.

original: de la theg pa gsum ni nyan thos dang / rang rgyal dang byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa yin la /
analyzed: de la theg pa gsum ni nyan thos dang / rang rgyal dang byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa yin la /
translated: The three vehicles are the vehicles of hearers, solitary realizers, and bodhisattvas.

original: de dag las rim pa ji lta ba bzhin du lus dang ngag rnams yang dag par sbyangs pa ni lam gyi gnas skabs kyi mtshan nyid la gong nas nges par 'byung ba zhes bya la bdag nyid kyi sems yang dag par sbyang ba'i phyir theg pa rnams kyi
analyzed: de dag las rim pa ji lta ba bzhin du lus dang ngag rnams yang dag par sbyangs pa ni lam gyi gnas skabs kyi mtshan nyid la gong nas nges par 'byung ba zhes bya la bdag nyid kyi sems yang dag par sbyang ba'i phyir theg pa rnams kyi
translated: In accordance with those stages, the purification of body and speech is called “the one who is definitely released from the state of the path.”🔽In order to purify one’s mind, the vehicle of the Great Vajra Vehicle, which is the best or supreme, is the basis.

original: rab bam mchog chen por 'gyur ba'i rdo rje theg pa chen po'i gnas na bde ba chen po'i tshul gyis 'bras bu nyid lam du byas nas myur ba nyid du 'bras bu la gnas par byed pa ni 'bras bu'i sa la rab tu gnas so zhes bya bar
analyzed: rab bam mchog chen por 'gyur ba'i rdo rje theg pa chen po'i gnas na bde ba chen po'i tshul gyis 'bras bu nyid lam du byas nas myur ba nyid du 'bras bu la gnas par byed pa ni 'bras bu'i sa la rab tu gnas so zhes bya bar
translated: The result itself is taken as the path by means of the method of great bliss, and one is established quickly in the result.🔽This is called “well established in the stage of the result.”

original: dgongs so // de lta bu 'bras bu'i theg pa'i yon tan ji lta bu yin snyam pa la /
analyzed: dgongs so // de lta bu 'bras bu'i theg pa'i yon tan ji lta bu yin snyam pa la /
translated: What are the qualities of the vehicle of the result like?

original: nyon mongs khams rnams dag pa'i bdag / ces gsungs te /
analyzed: nyon mongs khams rnams dag pa'i bdag / ces gsungs te /
translated: The self that purifies the elements of affliction

original: de ltar 'bras bu'i mtshan nyid rdo rje theg pa'i 'dod chags la sogs nyon mongs pa'i dri ma rnams rjes su mthun pa'i stobs kyis dag par byed pa de la de skad ces bya la /
analyzed: de ltar 'bras bu'i mtshan nyid rdo rje theg pa'i 'dod chags la sogs nyon mongs pa'i dri ma rnams rjes su mthun pa'i stobs kyis dag par byed pa de la de skad ces bya la /
translated: Thus, the characteristic of the result is called “purification of the stains of the afflictions such as desire in the Vajra Vehicle by the power of similarity.”

original: de nyid kyi las kyi rgyu dang las kyi 'bras bu thams cad zad par byed pa ni /
analyzed: de nyid kyi las kyi rgyu dang las kyi 'bras bu thams cad zad par byed pa ni /
translated: That itself is called “the exhaustion of all causes of karma and all results of karma.”

original: las kyi khams rnams zad byed pa //
analyzed: las kyi khams rnams zad byed pa //
translated: It is called “the exhaustion of the elements of karma.”

original: zhes bya'o // de nyid las dang nyon mongs pa dpag tu med pa yang dang yang du 'byung bar gyur pa'i rgyur gyur pas na khams zhes bya ste /
analyzed: zhes bya'o // de nyid las dang nyon mongs pa dpag tu med pa yang dang yang du 'byung bar gyur pa'i rgyur gyur pas na khams zhes bya ste /
translated: That itself is called “the element” because it is the cause for the arising of immeasurable karma and afflictions again and again.

original: de yang gsang 'dus rgyud phyi ma las /
analyzed: de yang gsang 'dus rgyud phyi ma las /
translated: The Continuation of the Guhyasamaja Tantra says:🔽The vajra amrita of the afflictions

original: nyon mongs rdo rje bdud rtsi dag / las rnams thams cad 'grub par 'gyur //
analyzed: nyon mongs rdo rje bdud rtsi dag / las rnams thams cad 'grub par 'gyur //
translated: accomplishes all activities.

original: las rnams thams cad dag pa las //
analyzed: las rnams thams cad dag pa las //
translated: From the purification of all activities🔽the results born from karma

original: las las skyes pa'i 'bras bu dag / ces gsungs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: las las skyes pa'i 'bras bu dag / ces gsungs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: are the result of the element of karma.

original: chu bo rgya mtsho kun las rgal / zhes bya ba ni chu bo ni 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal dpag tu med pa yin la /
analyzed: chu bo rgya mtsho kun las rgal / zhes bya ba ni chu bo ni 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal dpag tu med pa yin la /
translated: The line having crossed over all the rivers and oceans refers to the rivers of samsara's immeasurable suffering.

original: de las rab tu rgal zhes bya ba nyid do //
analyzed: de las rab tu rgal zhes bya ba nyid do //
translated: The phrase having crossed over refers to that very fact.

original: de lta bu'i thabs de dang shes rab de dang bde ba chen por mnyam par sbyor ba spros pa dang bral ba'i mtshan ma las yang dag par byung ba yin la /🔽sbyor ba'i @267b dgon pa las byung ba //
analyzed: de lta bu'i thabs de dang shes rab de dang bde ba chen por mnyam par sbyor ba spros pa dang bral ba'i mtshan ma las yang dag par byung ba yin la / sbyor ba'i @267b dgon pa las byung ba //
translated: Such a method, that wisdom, and the union in great bliss arise from the signless, free of elaboration.

original: zhes bya ba nyid do //
analyzed: zhes bya ba nyid do //
translated: The line having emerged from the wilderness of union refers to that very fact.

original: de ltar thabs dang shes rab mnyam par sbyor ba las byung ba'i mtshan nyid kyis mtshams med pa rnam pa lnga dang / srog gcod pa la sogs pa'i bas pham par gyur ba'i chos bzhi dang / tshig rtsub mo la sogs pa phra mo'i nyon mongs ba ma lus pa rnams dang /
analyzed: de ltar thabs dang shes rab mnyam par sbyor ba las byung ba'i mtshan nyid kyis mtshams med pa rnam pa lnga dang / srog gcod pa la sogs pa'i bas pham par gyur ba'i chos bzhi dang / tshig rtsub mo la sogs pa phra mo'i nyon mongs ba ma lus pa rnams dang /
translated: Thus, the five heinous acts, the four defeating acts such as taking life, and all the subtle afflictions such as harsh speech, arise from the union of method and wisdom.

original: de las byung ba bag chags kyi sa bon ma lus pa thams cad phyis sa bon mi 'jog pa'i tshul gyis spangs pa gang yin pa de la /🔽nyon mongs nye ba kun nyon mongs //
analyzed: de las byung ba bag chags kyi sa bon ma lus pa thams cad phyis sa bon mi 'jog pa'i tshul gyis spangs pa gang yin pa de la / nyon mongs nye ba kun nyon mongs //
translated: That which arises from that is the complete abandonment of all seeds of latent tendencies, in the manner of not positing seeds later.🔽That is the abandonment of all afflictions and

original: bag chags bcas pa gtan spangs pa //🔽zhes bya ba nyid do //
analyzed: bag chags bcas pa gtan spangs pa // zhes bya ba nyid do //
translated: afflictive obscurations,🔽together with their latent tendencies.

original: snying rje chen po shes rab thabs //
analyzed: snying rje chen po shes rab thabs //
translated: Great compassion is wisdom and method.

original: zhes bya ba ni las kyi phyag rgya dang / rnal 'byor pa'i mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / ye shes kyi bdag nyid ni shes rab dang thabs kyi ngo bo ste /
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni las kyi phyag rgya dang / rnal 'byor pa'i mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / ye shes kyi bdag nyid ni shes rab dang thabs kyi ngo bo ste /
translated: The characteristics of the karma consort and the yogin are the nature of wisdom and method, which are the nature of emptiness and gnosis.

original: de nyid ro mnyam pa las byung ba'i bde ba chen po ni khams gsum gyi sems can thams cad la khyab pa'i phyir na snying rje chen po zhes bya zhing /🔽de lta bu'i tshul gyis 'gro ba'i don 'bras bu dang bcas pa'i byed pa gang yin pa de ni /
analyzed: de nyid ro mnyam pa las byung ba'i bde ba chen po ni khams gsum gyi sems can thams cad la khyab pa'i phyir na snying rje chen po zhes bya zhing / de lta bu'i tshul gyis 'gro ba'i don 'bras bu dang bcas pa'i byed pa gang yin pa de ni /
translated: That itself is great bliss, which arises from the same taste, and since it pervades all sentient beings of the three realms, it is called “great compassion.”🔽The function of accomplishing the benefit of migrating beings in that way is

original: don yod 'gro ba'i don byed pa //🔽zhes bya ba nyid do //
analyzed: don yod 'gro ba'i don byed pa //🔽zhes bya ba nyid do //
translated: accomplishing the purpose of migrating beings without exception.

original: de ltar de lta bu'i bde ba chen po'i stobs phyin ci log gi shes pa sna tshogs pa'i yul la mtshan ma'i dngos por 'dzin pa'i mtshan ma'i rnam par rtog pa ma lus par spangs bar gyur pa gang yin pa de ni /
analyzed: de ltar de lta bu'i bde ba chen po'i stobs phyin ci log gi shes pa sna tshogs pa'i yul la mtshan ma'i dngos por 'dzin pa'i mtshan ma'i rnam par rtog pa ma lus par spangs bar gyur pa gang yin pa de ni /
translated: Abandoning the meaning of all discriminations.🔽The meaning of the verse:

original: 'du shes kun gyi don spangs shing //
analyzed: 'du shes kun gyi don spangs shing //
translated: Stopping the meaning of consciousness.

original: bya ba la bag chags kyi rnam par snang ba'i don rta dang glang po la sogs pa'i gnas dang / lus dang longs spyod du snang ba thams cad 'gag bar byed pa ni /🔽rnam shes don ni 'gog bar byed //
analyzed: bya ba la bag chags kyi rnam par snang ba'i don rta dang glang po la sogs pa'i gnas dang / lus dang longs spyod du snang ba thams cad 'gag bar byed pa ni / rnam shes don ni 'gog bar byed //
translated: is that it stops all appearances of the objects of karma and latent tendencies, such as the appearances of horses, elephants, and so on, as well as the appearances of bodies and enjoyments.🔽The meaning of the verse:

original: ces bya ste /
analyzed: ces bya ste /
translated: Stopping the meaning of consciousness.

original: gnyis su med pa'i bde ba chen po skyes pa dang dus mtshungs par mig la sogs pa'i dbang po thams cad dang gzugs la sogs pa'i yul thams cad 'gag par mdzad cing rang rig pa'i ye shes sad par mdzad ces par dgongs so //
analyzed: gnyis su med pa'i bde ba chen po skyes pa dang dus mtshungs par mig la sogs pa'i dbang po thams cad dang gzugs la sogs pa'i yul thams cad 'gag par mdzad cing rang rig pa'i ye shes sad par mdzad ces par dgongs so //
translated: is that at the time of the arising of nondual great bliss, all the sense organs such as the eyes and all the objects such as form are stopped and the gnosis of self-awareness is awakened.

original: de lta bu'i rgyu dri ma dang bral ba'i mtshan nyid las yongs su grub pa'i 'bras bu'i dri ma dang bral pa'i bdag nyid kyi don phun sum tshogs pa bshad nas /
analyzed: de lta bu'i rgyu dri ma dang bral ba'i mtshan nyid las yongs su grub pa'i 'bras bu'i dri ma dang bral pa'i bdag nyid kyi don phun sum tshogs pa bshad nas /
translated: Having explained the perfect meaning, the nature of the result free from stains, which is the fully present nature that is the cause free from stains,🔽the other-dependent nature is taught to be the source of the perfect benefit for others.
